13105 }
13106 
13117 void QCPLegend::setSelectableParts(const SelectableParts &selectable)
13118 {
13119  if (mSelectableParts != selectable)
13120  {
13121  mSelectableParts = selectable;
13122  emit selectableChanged(mSelectableParts);
13123  }
13124 }
13125 
13147 void QCPLegend::setSelectedParts(const SelectableParts &selected)
13148 {
13149  SelectableParts newSelected = selected;
13150  mSelectedParts = this->selectedParts(); // update mSelectedParts in case item selection changed
13151 
13152  if (mSelectedParts != newSelected)
13153  {
13154  if (!mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // attempt to set spItems flag (can't do that)
13155  {
13156  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "spItems flag can not be set, it can only be unset with this function";
13157  newSelected &= ~spItems;
13158  }
13159  if (mSelectedParts.testFlag(spItems) && !newSelected.testFlag(spItems)) // spItems flag was unset, so clear item selection
13160  {
13161  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13162  {
13163  if (item(i))
13164  item(i)->setSelected(false);
13165  }
13166  }
13167  mSelectedParts = newSelected;
13168  emit selectionChanged(mSelectedParts);
13169  }
13170 }
13171 
13178 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13179 {
13180  mSelectedBorderPen = pen;
13181 }
13182 
13188 void QCPLegend::setSelectedIconBorderPen(const QPen &pen)
13189 {
13190  mSelectedIconBorderPen = pen;
13191 }
13192 
13199 void QCPLegend::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
13200 {
13201  mSelectedBrush = brush;
13202 }
13203 
13211 void QCPLegend::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
13212 {
13213  mSelectedFont = font;
13214  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13215  {
13216  if (item(i))
13217  item(i)->setSelectedFont(font);
13218  }
13219 }
13220 
13228 void QCPLegend::setSelectedTextColor(const QColor &color)
13229 {
13230  mSelectedTextColor = color;
13231  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13232  {
13233  if (item(i))
13234  item(i)->setSelectedTextColor(color);
13235  }
13236 }
13237 
13243 QCPAbstractLegendItem *QCPLegend::item(int index) const
13244 {
13245  return qobject_cast<QCPAbstractLegendItem*>(elementAt(index));
13246 }
13247 
13254 QCPPlottableLegendItem *QCPLegend::itemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
13255 {
13256  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13257  {
13258  if (QCPPlottableLegendItem *pli = qobject_cast<QCPPlottableLegendItem*>(item(i)))
13259  {
13260  if (pli->plottable() == plottable)
13261  return pli;
13262  }
13263  }
13264  return 0;
13265 }
13266 
13271 int QCPLegend::itemCount() const
13272 {
13273  return elementCount();
13274 }
13275 
13279 bool QCPLegend::hasItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item) const
13280 {
13281  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13282  {
13283  if (item == this->item(i))
13284  return true;
13285  }
13286  return false;
13287 }
13288 
13295 bool QCPLegend::hasItemWithPlottable(const QCPAbstractPlottable *plottable) const
13296 {
13297  return itemWithPlottable(plottable);
13298 }
13299 
13307 bool QCPLegend::addItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
13308 {
13309  if (!hasItem(item))
13310  {
13311  return addElement(rowCount(), 0, item);
13312  } else
13313  return false;
13314 }
13315 
13323 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(int index)
13324 {
13325  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(index))
13326  {
13327  bool success = remove(ali);
13328  simplify();
13329  return success;
13330  } else
13331  return false;
13332 }
13333 
13342 bool QCPLegend::removeItem(QCPAbstractLegendItem *item)
13343 {
13344  bool success = remove(item);
13345  simplify();
13346  return success;
13347 }
13348 
13352 void QCPLegend::clearItems()
13353 {
13354  for (int i=itemCount()-1; i>=0; --i)
13355  removeItem(i);
13356 }
13357 
13364 QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem *> QCPLegend::selectedItems() const
13365 {
13366  QList<QCPAbstractLegendItem*> result;
13367  for (int i=0; i<itemCount(); ++i)
13368  {
13369  if (QCPAbstractLegendItem *ali = item(i))
13370  {
13371  if (ali->selected())
13372  result.append(ali);
13373  }
13374  }
13375  return result;
13376 }
13377 
13391 void QCPLegend::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13392 {
13393  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeLegend);
13394 }
13395 
13401 QPen QCPLegend::getBorderPen() const
13402 {
13403  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBorderPen : mBorderPen;
13404 }
13405 
13411 QBrush QCPLegend::getBrush() const
13412 {
13413  return mSelectedParts.testFlag(spLegendBox) ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
13414 }
13415 
13421 void QCPLegend::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13422 {
13423  // draw background rect:
13424  painter->setBrush(getBrush());
13425  painter->setPen(getBorderPen());
13426  painter->drawRect(mOuterRect);
13427 }
13428 
13429 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13430 double QCPLegend::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13431 {
13432  if (!mParentPlot) return -1;
13433  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13434  return -1;
13435 
13436  if (mOuterRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
13437  {
13438  if (details) details->setValue(spLegendBox);
13439  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13440  }
13441  return -1;
13442 }
13443 
13444 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13445 void QCPLegend::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13446 {
13447  Q_UNUSED(event)
13448  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
13449  if (details.value<SelectablePart>() == spLegendBox && mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13450  {
13451  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
13452  setSelectedParts(additive ? mSelectedParts^spLegendBox : mSelectedParts|spLegendBox); // no need to unset spItems in !additive case, because they will be deselected by QCustomPlot (they're normal QCPLayerables with own deselectEvent)
13453  if (selectionStateChanged)
13454  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
13455  }
13456 }
13457 
13458 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13459 void QCPLegend::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13460 {
13461  mSelectedParts = selectedParts(); // in case item selection has changed
13462  if (mSelectableParts.testFlag(spLegendBox))
13463  {
13464  SelectableParts selBefore = mSelectedParts;
13465  setSelectedParts(selectedParts() & ~spLegendBox);
13466  if (selectionStateChanged)
13467  *selectionStateChanged = mSelectedParts != selBefore;
13468  }
13469 }
13470 
13471 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13472 QCP::Interaction QCPLegend::selectionCategory() const
13473 {
13474  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
13475 }
13476 
13477 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13478 QCP::Interaction QCPAbstractLegendItem::selectionCategory() const
13479 {
13480  return QCP::iSelectLegend;
13481 }
13482 
13483 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13484 void QCPLegend::parentPlotInitialized(QCustomPlot *parentPlot)
13485 {
13486  Q_UNUSED(parentPlot)
13487 }
13488 
13489 
13493 
13512 /* start documentation of signals */
13513 
13522 /* end documentation of signals */
13523 
13529 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
13530  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13531  mFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 13*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
13532  mTextColor(Qt::black),
13533  mSelectedFont(QFont(QLatin1String("sans serif"), 13*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
13534  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
13535  mSelectable(false),
13536  mSelected(false)
13537 {
13538  if (parentPlot)
13539  {
13540  setLayer(parentPlot->currentLayer());
13541  mFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold);
13542  mSelectedFont = QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold);
13543  }
13544  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
13545 }
13546 
13551 QCPPlotTitle::QCPPlotTitle(QCustomPlot *parentPlot, const QString &text) :
13552  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13553  mText(text),
13554  mFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.5, QFont::Bold)),
13555  mTextColor(Qt::black),
13556  mSelectedFont(QFont(parentPlot->font().family(), parentPlot->font().pointSize()*1.6, QFont::Bold)),
13557  mSelectedTextColor(Qt::blue),
13558  mSelectable(false),
13559  mSelected(false)
13560 {
13561  setLayer(QLatin1String("axes"));
13562  setMargins(QMargins(5, 5, 5, 0));
13563 }
13564 
13570 void QCPPlotTitle::setText(const QString &text)
13571 {
13572  mText = text;
13573 }

13580 void QCPPlotTitle::setFont(const QFont &font)
13581 {
13582  mFont = font;
13583 }

13591 {
13592  mTextColor = color;
13593 }

13600 void QCPPlotTitle::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
13601 {
13602  mSelectedFont = font;
13603 }
13604

13611 {
13612  mSelectedTextColor = color;
13613 }

13621 void QCPPlotTitle::setSelectable(bool selectable)
13622 {
13623  if (mSelectable != selectable)
13624  {
13625  mSelectable = selectable;
13626  emit selectableChanged(mSelectable);
13627  }
13628 }
13629 
13637 void QCPPlotTitle::setSelected(bool selected)
13638 {
13639  if (mSelected != selected)
13640  {
13641  mSelected = selected;
13642  emit selectionChanged(mSelected);
13643  }
13644 }
13645 
13646 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13647 void QCPPlotTitle::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
13648 {
13649  applyAntialiasingHint(painter, mAntialiased, QCP::aeNone);
13650 }
13651 
13652 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13653 void QCPPlotTitle::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
13654 {
13655  painter->setFont(mainFont());
13656  painter->setPen(QPen(mainTextColor()));
13657  painter->drawText(mRect, Qt::AlignCenter, mText, &mTextBoundingRect);
13658 }
13659 
13660 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13661 QSize QCPPlotTitle::minimumSizeHint() const
13662 {
13663  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
13664  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
13665  result.rwidth() += mMargins.left() + mMargins.right();
13666  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
13667  return result;
13668 }
13669 
13670 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13671 QSize QCPPlotTitle::maximumSizeHint() const
13672 {
13673  QFontMetrics metrics(mFont);
13674  QSize result = metrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::AlignCenter, mText).size();
13675  result.rheight() += mMargins.top() + mMargins.bottom();
13676  result.setWidth(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
13677  return result;
13678 }
13679 
13680 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13681 void QCPPlotTitle::selectEvent(QMouseEvent *event, bool additive, const QVariant &details, bool *selectionStateChanged)
13682 {
13683  Q_UNUSED(event)
13684  Q_UNUSED(details)
13685  if (mSelectable)
13686  {
13687  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13688  setSelected(additive ? !mSelected : true);
13689  if (selectionStateChanged)
13690  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13691  }
13692 }
13693 
13694 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13695 void QCPPlotTitle::deselectEvent(bool *selectionStateChanged)
13696 {
13697  if (mSelectable)
13698  {
13699  bool selBefore = mSelected;
13700  setSelected(false);
13701  if (selectionStateChanged)
13702  *selectionStateChanged = mSelected != selBefore;
13703  }
13704 }
13705 
13706 /* inherits documentation from base class */
13707 double QCPPlotTitle::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
13708 {
13709  Q_UNUSED(details)
13710  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
13711  return -1;
13712 
13713  if (mTextBoundingRect.contains(pos.toPoint()))
13714  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
13715  else
13716  return -1;
13717 }
13718 
13724 QFont QCPPlotTitle::mainFont() const
13725 {
13726  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
13727 }
13728 
13734 QColor QCPPlotTitle::mainTextColor() const
13735 {
13736  return mSelected ? mSelectedTextColor : mTextColor;
13737 }
13738 
13739 
13743 
13792 /* start documentation of inline functions */
13793 
13807 /* end documentation of signals */
13808 /* start documentation of signals */
13809 
13831 /* end documentation of signals */
13832 
13836 QCPColorScale::QCPColorScale(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
13837  QCPLayoutElement(parentPlot),
13838  mType(QCPAxis::atTop), // set to atTop such that setType(QCPAxis::atRight) below doesn't skip work because it thinks it's already atRight
13839  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
13840  mBarWidth(20),
13841  mAxisRect(new QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(this))
13842 {
13843  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 6, 0, 6)); // for default right color scale types, keep some room at bottom and top (important if no margin group is used)
13844  setType(QCPAxis::atRight);
13845  setDataRange(QCPRange(0, 6));
13846 }
13847 
13848 QCPColorScale::~QCPColorScale()
13849 {
13850  delete mAxisRect;
13851 }
13852 
13853 /* undocumented getter */
13854 QString QCPColorScale::label() const
13855 {
13856  if (!mColorAxis)
13857  {
13858  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
13859  return QString();
13860  }
13861 
13862  return mColorAxis.data()->label();
13863 }
13864 
13865 /* undocumented getter */
13866 bool QCPColorScale::rangeDrag() const
13867 {
13868  if (!mAxisRect)
13869  {
13870  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
13871  return false;
13872  }
13873 
13874  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeDrag().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13875  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13876  mAxisRect.data()->rangeDragAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
13877 }
13878 
13879 /* undocumented getter */
13880 bool QCPColorScale::rangeZoom() const
13881 {
13882  if (!mAxisRect)
13883  {
13884  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
13885  return false;
13886  }
13887 
13888  return mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoom().testFlag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13889  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType)) &&
13890  mAxisRect.data()->rangeZoomAxis(QCPAxis::orientation(mType))->orientation() == QCPAxis::orientation(mType);
13891 }
13892 
13900 void QCPColorScale::setType(QCPAxis::AxisType type)
13901 {
13902  if (!mAxisRect)
13903  {
13904  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
13905  return;
13906  }
13907  if (mType != type)
13908  {
13909  mType = type;
13910  QCPRange rangeTransfer(0, 6);
13911  double logBaseTransfer = 10;
13912  QString labelTransfer;
13913  // revert some settings on old axis:
13914  if (mColorAxis)
13915  {
13916  rangeTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->range();
13917  labelTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->label();
13918  logBaseTransfer = mColorAxis.data()->scaleLogBase();
13919  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(QString());
13920  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
13921  disconnect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
13922  }
13923  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType atype, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop)
13924  {
13925  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTicks(atype == mType);
13926  mAxisRect.data()->axis(atype)->setTickLabels(atype== mType);
13927  }
13928  // set new mColorAxis pointer:
13929  mColorAxis = mAxisRect.data()->axis(mType);
13930  // transfer settings to new axis:
13931  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(rangeTransfer); // transfer range of old axis to new one (necessary if axis changes from vertical to horizontal or vice versa)
13932  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(labelTransfer);
13933  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleLogBase(logBaseTransfer); // scaleType is synchronized among axes in realtime via signals (connected in QCPColorScale ctor), so we only need to take care of log base here
13934  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
13935  connect(mColorAxis.data(), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
13936  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDragAxes(QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Horizontal ? mColorAxis.data() : 0,
13937  QCPAxis::orientation(mType) == Qt::Vertical ? mColorAxis.data() : 0);
13938  }
13939 }
13940 
13950 void QCPColorScale::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
13951 {
13952  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
13953  {
13954  mDataRange = dataRange;
13955  if (mColorAxis)
13956  mColorAxis.data()->setRange(mDataRange);
13957  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
13958  }
13959 }
13960 
13971 void QCPColorScale::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
13972 {
13973  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
13974  {
13975  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
13976  if (mColorAxis)
13977  mColorAxis.data()->setScaleType(mDataScaleType);
13978  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
13979  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
13980  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
13981  }
13982 }
13983 
13991 void QCPColorScale::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient)
13992 {
13993  if (mGradient != gradient)
13994  {
13995  mGradient = gradient;
13996  if (mAxisRect)
13997  mAxisRect.data()->mGradientImageInvalidated = true;
13998  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
13999  }
14000 }
14001 
14006 void QCPColorScale::setLabel(const QString &str)
14007 {
14008  if (!mColorAxis)
14009  {
14010  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal color axis undefined";
14011  return;
14012  }
14013 
14014  mColorAxis.data()->setLabel(str);
14015 }
14016 
14021 void QCPColorScale::setBarWidth(int width)
14022 {
14023  mBarWidth = width;
14024 }
14025 
14032 void QCPColorScale::setRangeDrag(bool enabled)
14033 {
14034  if (!mAxisRect)
14035  {
14036  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14037  return;
14038  }
14039 
14040  if (enabled)
14041  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
14042  else
14043  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeDrag(0);
14044 }
14045 
14052 void QCPColorScale::setRangeZoom(bool enabled)
14053 {
14054  if (!mAxisRect)
14055  {
14056  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14057  return;
14058  }
14059 
14060  if (enabled)
14061  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(QCPAxis::orientation(mType));
14062  else
14063  mAxisRect.data()->setRangeZoom(0);
14064 }
14065 
14069 QList<QCPColorMap*> QCPColorScale::colorMaps() const
14070 {
14071  QList<QCPColorMap*> result;
14072  for (int i=0; i<mParentPlot->plottableCount(); ++i)
14073  {
14074  if (QCPColorMap *cm = qobject_cast<QCPColorMap*>(mParentPlot->plottable(i)))
14075  if (cm->colorScale() == this)
14076  result.append(cm);
14077  }
14078  return result;
14079 }
14080 
14087 void QCPColorScale::rescaleDataRange(bool onlyVisibleMaps)
14088 {
14089  QList<QCPColorMap*> maps = colorMaps();
14090  QCPRange newRange;
14091  bool haveRange = false;
14092  int sign = 0; // TODO: should change this to QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain later (currently is protected, maybe move to QCP namespace)
14093  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
14094  sign = (mDataRange.upper < 0 ? -1 : 1);
14095  for (int i=0; i<maps.size(); ++i)
14096  {
14097  if (!maps.at(i)->realVisibility() && onlyVisibleMaps)
14098  continue;
14099  QCPRange mapRange;
14100  if (maps.at(i)->colorScale() == this)
14101  {
14102  bool currentFoundRange = true;
14103  mapRange = maps.at(i)->data()->dataBounds();
14104  if (sign == 1)
14105  {
14106  if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper > 0)
14107  mapRange.lower = mapRange.upper*1e-3;
14108  else if (mapRange.lower <= 0 && mapRange.upper <= 0)
14109  currentFoundRange = false;
14110  } else if (sign == -1)
14111  {
14112  if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower < 0)
14113  mapRange.upper = mapRange.lower*1e-3;
14114  else if (mapRange.upper >= 0 && mapRange.lower >= 0)
14115  currentFoundRange = false;
14116  }
14117  if (currentFoundRange)
14118  {
14119  if (!haveRange)
14120  newRange = mapRange;
14121  else
14122  newRange.expand(mapRange);
14123  haveRange = true;
14124  }
14125  }
14126  }
14127  if (haveRange)
14128  {
14129  if (!QCPRange::validRange(newRange)) // likely due to range being zero (plottable has only constant data in this dimension), shift current range to at least center the data
14130  {
14131  double center = (newRange.lower+newRange.upper)*0.5; // upper and lower should be equal anyway, but just to make sure, incase validRange returned false for other reason
14132  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLinear)
14133  {
14134  newRange.lower = center-mDataRange.size()/2.0;
14135  newRange.upper = center+mDataRange.size()/2.0;
14136  } else // mScaleType == stLogarithmic
14137  {
14138  newRange.lower = center/qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
14139  newRange.upper = center*qSqrt(mDataRange.upper/mDataRange.lower);
14140  }
14141  }
14142  setDataRange(newRange);
14143  }
14144 }
14145 
14146 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14147 void QCPColorScale::update(UpdatePhase phase)
14148 {
14149  QCPLayoutElement::update(phase);
14150  if (!mAxisRect)
14151  {
14152  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14153  return;
14154  }
14155 
14156  mAxisRect.data()->update(phase);
14157 
14158  switch (phase)
14159  {
14160  case upMargins:
14161  {
14162  if (mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
14163  {
14164  setMaximumSize(QWIDGETSIZE_MAX, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom()+margins().top()+margins().bottom());
14165  setMinimumSize(0, mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().top()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().bottom()+margins().top()+margins().bottom());
14166  } else
14167  {
14168  setMaximumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right()+margins().left()+margins().right(), QWIDGETSIZE_MAX);
14169  setMinimumSize(mBarWidth+mAxisRect.data()->margins().left()+mAxisRect.data()->margins().right()+margins().left()+margins().right(), 0);
14170  }
14171  break;
14172  }
14173  case upLayout:
14174  {
14175  mAxisRect.data()->setOuterRect(rect());
14176  break;
14177  }
14178  default: break;
14179  }
14180 }
14181 
14182 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14183 void QCPColorScale::applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(QCPPainter *painter) const
14184 {
14185  painter->setAntialiasing(false);
14186 }
14187 
14188 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14189 void QCPColorScale::mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
14190 {
14191  if (!mAxisRect)
14192  {
14193  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14194  return;
14195  }
14196  mAxisRect.data()->mousePressEvent(event);
14197 }
14198 
14199 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14200 void QCPColorScale::mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
14201 {
14202  if (!mAxisRect)
14203  {
14204  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14205  return;
14206  }
14207  mAxisRect.data()->mouseMoveEvent(event);
14208 }
14209 
14210 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14211 void QCPColorScale::mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent *event)
14212 {
14213  if (!mAxisRect)
14214  {
14215  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14216  return;
14217  }
14218  mAxisRect.data()->mouseReleaseEvent(event);
14219 }
14220 
14221 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14222 void QCPColorScale::wheelEvent(QWheelEvent *event)
14223 {
14224  if (!mAxisRect)
14225  {
14226  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "internal axis rect was deleted";
14227  return;
14228  }
14229  mAxisRect.data()->wheelEvent(event);
14230 }
14231 
14235 
14250 QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate(QCPColorScale *parentColorScale) :
14251  QCPAxisRect(parentColorScale->parentPlot(), true),
14252  mParentColorScale(parentColorScale),
14253  mGradientImageInvalidated(true)
14254 {
14255  setParentLayerable(parentColorScale);
14256  setMinimumMargins(QMargins(0, 0, 0, 0));
14257  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14258  {
14259  axis(type)->setVisible(true);
14260  axis(type)->grid()->setVisible(false);
14261  axis(type)->setPadding(0);
14262  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
14263  connect(axis(type), SIGNAL(selectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)), this, SLOT(axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts)));
14264  }
14265 
14266  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14267  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14268  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14269  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(rangeChanged(QCPRange)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setRange(QCPRange)));
14270  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14271  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atRight), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atLeft), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14272  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14273  connect(axis(QCPAxis::atTop), SIGNAL(scaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), axis(QCPAxis::atBottom), SLOT(setScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
14274 
14275  // make layer transfers of color scale transfer to axis rect and axes
14276  // the axes must be set after axis rect, such that they appear above color gradient drawn by axis rect:
14277  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), this, SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
14278  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14279  connect(parentColorScale, SIGNAL(layerChanged(QCPLayer*)), axis(type), SLOT(setLayer(QCPLayer*)));
14280 }
14281 
14286 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
14287 {
14288  if (mGradientImageInvalidated)
14289  updateGradientImage();
14290 
14291  bool mirrorHorz = false;
14292  bool mirrorVert = false;
14293  if (mParentColorScale->mColorAxis)
14294  {
14295  mirrorHorz = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atTop);
14296  mirrorVert = mParentColorScale->mColorAxis.data()->rangeReversed() && (mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atLeft || mParentColorScale->type() == QCPAxis::atRight);
14297  }
14298 
14299  painter->drawImage(rect(), mGradientImage.mirrored(mirrorHorz, mirrorVert));
14300  QCPAxisRect::draw(painter);
14301 }
14302 
14308 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::updateGradientImage()
14309 {
14310  if (rect().isEmpty())
14311  return;
14312 
14313  int n = mParentColorScale->mGradient.levelCount();
14314  int w, h;
14315  QVector<double> data(n);
14316  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14317  data[i] = i;
14318  if (mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atBottom || mParentColorScale->mType == QCPAxis::atTop)
14319  {
14320  w = n;
14321  h = rect().height();
14322  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
14323  QVector<QRgb*> pixels;
14324  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
14325  pixels.append(reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y)));
14326  mParentColorScale->mGradient.colorize(data.constData(), QCPRange(0, n-1), pixels.first(), n);
14327  for (int y=1; y<h; ++y)
14328  memcpy(pixels.at(y), pixels.first(), n*sizeof(QRgb));
14329  } else
14330  {
14331  w = rect().width();
14332  h = n;
14333  mGradientImage = QImage(w, h, QImage::Format_RGB32);
14334  for (int y=0; y<h; ++y)
14335  {
14336  QRgb *pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mGradientImage.scanLine(y));
14337  const QRgb lineColor = mParentColorScale->mGradient.color(data[h-1-y], QCPRange(0, n-1));
14338  for (int x=0; x<w; ++x)
14339  pixels[x] = lineColor;
14340  }
14341  }
14342  mGradientImageInvalidated = false;
14343 }
14344 
14350 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectionChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectedParts)
14351 {
14352  // axis bases of four axes shall always (de-)selected synchronously:
14353  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14354  {
14355  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
14356  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
14357  continue;
14358 
14359  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14360  {
14361  if (selectedParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14362  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
14363  else
14364  axis(type)->setSelectedParts(axis(type)->selectedParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
14365  }
14366  }
14367 }
14368 
14374 void QCPColorScaleAxisRectPrivate::axisSelectableChanged(QCPAxis::SelectableParts selectableParts)
14375 {
14376  // synchronize axis base selectability:
14377  foreach (QCPAxis::AxisType type, QList<QCPAxis::AxisType>() << QCPAxis::atBottom << QCPAxis::atTop << QCPAxis::atLeft << QCPAxis::atRight)
14378  {
14379  if (QCPAxis *senderAxis = qobject_cast<QCPAxis*>(sender()))
14380  if (senderAxis->axisType() == type)
14381  continue;
14382 
14383  if (axis(type)->selectableParts().testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14384  {
14385  if (selectableParts.testFlag(QCPAxis::spAxis))
14386  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() | QCPAxis::spAxis);
14387  else
14388  axis(type)->setSelectableParts(axis(type)->selectableParts() & ~QCPAxis::spAxis);
14389  }
14390  }
14391 }
14392 
14393 
14397 
14417 QCPData::QCPData() :
14418  key(0),
14419  value(0),
14420  keyErrorPlus(0),
14421  keyErrorMinus(0),
14422  valueErrorPlus(0),
14423  valueErrorMinus(0)
14424 {
14425 }
14426 
14430 QCPData::QCPData(double key, double value) :
14431  key(key),
14432  value(value),
14433  keyErrorPlus(0),
14434  keyErrorMinus(0),
14435  valueErrorPlus(0),
14436  valueErrorMinus(0)
14437 {
14438 }
14439 
14440 
14444 
14479 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
14480 
14488 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
14489 
14501 QCPGraph::QCPGraph(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
14502  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis)
14503 {
14504  mData = new QCPDataMap;
14505 
14506  setPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 0));
14507  setErrorPen(QPen(Qt::black));
14508  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14509  setSelectedPen(QPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5));
14510  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
14511 
14512  setLineStyle(lsLine);
14513  setErrorType(etNone);
14514  setErrorBarSize(6);
14515  setErrorBarSkipSymbol(true);
14516  setChannelFillGraph(0);
14517  setAdaptiveSampling(true);
14518 }
14519 
14520 QCPGraph::~QCPGraph()
14521 {
14522  delete mData;
14523 }
14524 
14535 void QCPGraph::setData(QCPDataMap *data, bool copy)
14536 {
14537  if (mData == data)
14538  {
14539  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
14540  return;
14541  }
14542  if (copy)
14543  {
14544  *mData = *data;
14545  } else
14546  {
14547  delete mData;
14548  mData = data;
14549  }
14550 }
14551 
14558 void QCPGraph::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value)
14559 {
14560  mData->clear();
14561  int n = key.size();
14562  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14563  QCPData newData;
14564  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14565  {
14566  newData.key = key[i];
14567  newData.value = value[i];
14568  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
14569  }
14570 }
14571 
14581 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &valueError)
14582 {
14583  mData->clear();
14584  int n = key.size();
14585  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14586  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
14587  QCPData newData;
14588  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14589  {
14590  newData.key = key[i];
14591  newData.value = value[i];
14592  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
14593  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
14594  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14595  }
14596 }
14597 
14607 void QCPGraph::setDataValueError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus)
14608 {
14609  mData->clear();
14610  int n = key.size();
14611  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14612  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
14613  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
14614  QCPData newData;
14615  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14616  {
14617  newData.key = key[i];
14618  newData.value = value[i];
14619  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
14620  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
14621  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14622  }
14623 }

14634 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyError)
14635 {
14636  mData->clear();
14637  int n = key.size();
14638  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14639  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
14640  QCPData newData;
14641  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14642  {
14643  newData.key = key[i];
14644  newData.value = value[i];
14645  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
14646  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
14647  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14648  }
14649 }
14650 
14660 void QCPGraph::setDataKeyError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus)
14661 {
14662  mData->clear();
14663  int n = key.size();
14664  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14665  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
14666  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
14667  QCPData newData;
14668  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14669  {
14670  newData.key = key[i];
14671  newData.value = value[i];
14672  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
14673  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
14674  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14675  }
14676 }
14677 
14687 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyError, const QVector<double> &valueError)
14688 {
14689  mData->clear();
14690  int n = key.size();
14691  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14692  n = qMin(n, valueError.size());
14693  n = qMin(n, keyError.size());
14694  QCPData newData;
14695  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14696  {
14697  newData.key = key[i];
14698  newData.value = value[i];
14699  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyError[i];
14700  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyError[i];
14701  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueError[i];
14702  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueError[i];
14703  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14704  }
14705 }
14706 
14716 void QCPGraph::setDataBothError(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &value, const QVector<double> &keyErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &keyErrorPlus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorMinus, const QVector<double> &valueErrorPlus)
14717 {
14718  mData->clear();
14719  int n = key.size();
14720  n = qMin(n, value.size());
14721  n = qMin(n, valueErrorMinus.size());
14722  n = qMin(n, valueErrorPlus.size());
14723  n = qMin(n, keyErrorMinus.size());
14724  n = qMin(n, keyErrorPlus.size());
14725  QCPData newData;
14726  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14727  {
14728  newData.key = key[i];
14729  newData.value = value[i];
14730  newData.keyErrorMinus = keyErrorMinus[i];
14731  newData.keyErrorPlus = keyErrorPlus[i];
14732  newData.valueErrorMinus = valueErrorMinus[i];
14733  newData.valueErrorPlus = valueErrorPlus[i];
14734  mData->insertMulti(key[i], newData);
14735  }
14736 }

14806 
14816 void QCPGraph::setChannelFillGraph(QCPGraph *targetGraph)
14817 {
14818  // prevent setting channel target to this graph itself:
14819  if (targetGraph == this)
14820  {
14821  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph is this graph itself";
14822  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
14823  return;
14824  }
14825  // prevent setting channel target to a graph not in the plot:
14826  if (targetGraph && targetGraph->mParentPlot != mParentPlot)
14827  {
14828  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "targetGraph not in same plot";
14829  mChannelFillGraph = 0;
14830  return;
14831  }
14832 
14833  mChannelFillGraph = targetGraph;
14834 }
14835 
14867 void QCPGraph::setAdaptiveSampling(bool enabled)
14868 {
14869  mAdaptiveSampling = enabled;
14870 }
14871 
14880 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPDataMap &dataMap)
14881 {
14882  mData->unite(dataMap);
14883 }
14884 
14893 void QCPGraph::addData(const QCPData &data)
14894 {
14895  mData->insertMulti(data.key, data);
14896 }
14897 
14906 void QCPGraph::addData(double key, double value)
14907 {
14908  QCPData newData;
14909  newData.key = key;
14910  newData.value = value;
14911  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
14912 }
14913 
14922 void QCPGraph::addData(const QVector<double> &keys, const QVector<double> &values)
14923 {
14924  int n = qMin(keys.size(), values.size());
14925  QCPData newData;
14926  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
14927  {
14928  newData.key = keys[i];
14929  newData.value = values[i];
14930  mData->insertMulti(newData.key, newData);
14931  }
14932 }
14933 
14938 void QCPGraph::removeDataBefore(double key)
14939 {
14940  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
14941  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
14942  it = mData->erase(it);
14943 }
14944 
14949 void QCPGraph::removeDataAfter(double key)
14950 {
14951  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
14952  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
14953  while (it != mData->end())
14954  it = mData->erase(it);
14955 }
14956 
14964 void QCPGraph::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey)
14965 {
14966  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty()) return;
14967  QCPDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
14968  QCPDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
14969  while (it != itEnd)
14970  it = mData->erase(it);
14971 }
14972 
14981 void QCPGraph::removeData(double key)
14982 {
14983  mData->remove(key);
14984 }
14985 
14990 void QCPGraph::clearData()
14991 {
14992  mData->clear();
14993 }
14994 
14995 /* inherits documentation from base class */
14996 double QCPGraph::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
14997 {
14998  Q_UNUSED(details)
14999  if ((onlySelectable && !mSelectable) || mData->isEmpty())
15000  return -1;
15001  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
15002 
15003  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
15004  return pointDistance(pos);
15005  else
15006  return -1;
15007 }
15008 
15016 void QCPGraph::rescaleAxes(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15017 {
15018  rescaleKeyAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
15019  rescaleValueAxis(onlyEnlarge, includeErrorBars);
15020 }
15021 
15029 void QCPGraph::rescaleKeyAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15030 {
15031  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleKeyAxis with the only change
15032  // that getKeyRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
15033  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
15034 
15035  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15036  if (!keyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
15037 
15038  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
15039  if (keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15040  signDomain = (keyAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
15041 
15042  bool foundRange;
15043  QCPRange newRange = getKeyRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
15044 
15045  if (foundRange)
15046  {
15047  if (onlyEnlarge)
15048  {
15049  if (keyAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
15050  newRange.lower = keyAxis->range().lower;
15051  if (keyAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
15052  newRange.upper = keyAxis->range().upper;
15053  }
15054  keyAxis->setRange(newRange);
15055  }
15056 }
15057 
15065 void QCPGraph::rescaleValueAxis(bool onlyEnlarge, bool includeErrorBars) const
15066 {
15067  // this code is a copy of QCPAbstractPlottable::rescaleValueAxis with the only change
15068  // is that getValueRange is passed the includeErrorBars value.
15069  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
15070 
15071  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15072  if (!valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid value axis"; return; }
15073 
15074  SignDomain signDomain = sdBoth;
15075  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
15076  signDomain = (valueAxis->range().upper < 0 ? sdNegative : sdPositive);
15077 
15078  bool foundRange;
15079  QCPRange newRange = getValueRange(foundRange, signDomain, includeErrorBars);
15080 
15081  if (foundRange)
15082  {
15083  if (onlyEnlarge)
15084  {
15085  if (valueAxis->range().lower < newRange.lower)
15086  newRange.lower = valueAxis->range().lower;
15087  if (valueAxis->range().upper > newRange.upper)
15088  newRange.upper = valueAxis->range().upper;
15089  }
15090  valueAxis->setRange(newRange);
15091  }
15092 }
15093 
15094 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15095 void QCPGraph::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
15096 {
15097  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15098  if (mKeyAxis.data()->range().size() <= 0 || mData->isEmpty()) return;
15099  if (mLineStyle == lsNone && mScatterStyle.isNone()) return;
15100 
15101  // allocate line and (if necessary) point vectors:
15102  QVector<QPointF> *lineData = new QVector<QPointF>;
15103  QVector<QCPData> *scatterData = 0;
15104  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
15105  scatterData = new QVector<QCPData>;
15106 
15107  // fill vectors with data appropriate to plot style:
15108  getPlotData(lineData, scatterData);
15109 
15110  // check data validity if flag set:
15111 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
15112  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it;
15113  for (it = mData->constBegin(); it != mData->constEnd(); ++it)
15114  {
15115  if (QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().key, it.value().value) ||
15116  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().keyErrorPlus, it.value().keyErrorMinus) ||
15117  QCP::isInvalidData(it.value().valueErrorPlus, it.value().valueErrorPlus))
15118  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << it.key() << "invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
15119  }
15120 #endif
15121 
15122  // draw fill of graph:
15123  drawFill(painter, lineData);
15124 
15125  // draw line:
15126  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse)
15127  drawImpulsePlot(painter, lineData);
15128  else if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
15129  drawLinePlot(painter, lineData); // also step plots can be drawn as a line plot
15130 
15131  // draw scatters:
15132  if (scatterData)
15133  drawScatterPlot(painter, scatterData);
15134 
15135  // free allocated line and point vectors:
15136  delete lineData;
15137  if (scatterData)
15138  delete scatterData;
15139 }
15140 
15141 /* inherits documentation from base class */
15142 void QCPGraph::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
15143 {
15144  // draw fill:
15145  if (mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush)
15146  {
15147  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
15148  painter->fillRect(QRectF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.width(), rect.height()/3.0), mBrush);
15149  }
15150  // draw line vertically centered:
15151  if (mLineStyle != lsNone)
15152  {
15153  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15154  painter->setPen(mPen);
15155  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.left(), rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0, rect.right()+5, rect.top()+rect.height()/2.0)); // +5 on x2 else last segment is missing from dashed/dotted pens
15156  }
15157  // draw scatter symbol:
15158  if (!mScatterStyle.isNone())
15159  {
15160  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
15161  // scale scatter pixmap if it's too large to fit in legend icon rect:
15162  if (mScatterStyle.shape() == QCPScatterStyle::ssPixmap && (mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().width() > rect.width() || mScatterStyle.pixmap().size().height() > rect.height()))
15163  {
15164  QCPScatterStyle scaledStyle(mScatterStyle);
15165  scaledStyle.setPixmap(scaledStyle.pixmap().scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation));
15166  scaledStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15167  scaledStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
15168  } else
15169  {
15170  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15171  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, QRectF(rect).center());
15172  }
15173  }
15174 }
15175 
15194 void QCPGraph::getPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *lineData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15195 {
15196  switch(mLineStyle)
15197  {
15198  case lsNone: getScatterPlotData(scatterData); break;
15199  case lsLine: getLinePlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15200  case lsStepLeft: getStepLeftPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15201  case lsStepRight: getStepRightPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15202  case lsStepCenter: getStepCenterPlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15203  case lsImpulse: getImpulsePlotData(lineData, scatterData); break;
15204  }
15205 }
15206 
15218 void QCPGraph::getScatterPlotData(QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15219 {
15220  getPreparedData(0, scatterData);
15221 }
15222 
15234 void QCPGraph::getLinePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15235 {
15236  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15237  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15238  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15239  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData"; return; }
15240 
15241  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15242  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15243  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15244  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size());
15245 
15246  // transform lineData points to pixels:
15247  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15248  {
15249  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15250  {
15251  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15252  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
15253  }
15254  } else // key axis is horizontal
15255  {
15256  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15257  {
15258  (*linePixelData)[i].setX(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key));
15259  (*linePixelData)[i].setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15260  }
15261  }
15262 }
15263 
15275 void QCPGraph::getStepLeftPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15276 {
15277  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15278  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15279  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15280  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15281 
15282  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15283  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15284  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15285  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15286 
15287  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15288  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15289  {
15290  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15291  double key;
15292  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15293  {
15294  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15295  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastValue);
15296  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15297  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15298  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(lastValue);
15299  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(key);
15300  }
15301  } else // key axis is horizontal
15302  {
15303  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15304  double key;
15305  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15306  {
15307  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15308  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15309  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastValue);
15310  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15311  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(key);
15312  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(lastValue);
15313  }
15314  }
15315 }
15316 
15328 void QCPGraph::getStepRightPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15329 {
15330  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15331  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15332  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15333  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15334 
15335  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15336  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15337  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15338  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15339 
15340  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15341  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15342  {
15343  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15344  double value;
15345  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15346  {
15347  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15348  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(value);
15349  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastKey);
15350  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15351  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(value);
15352  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(lastKey);
15353  }
15354  } else // key axis is horizontal
15355  {
15356  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15357  double value;
15358  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15359  {
15360  value = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15361  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastKey);
15362  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(value);
15363  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15364  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(lastKey);
15365  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(value);
15366  }
15367  }
15368 }
15369 
15381 void QCPGraph::getStepCenterPlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15382 {
15383  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15384  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15385  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15386  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as lineData"; return; }
15387 
15388  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15389  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15390  linePixelData->reserve(lineData.size()*2+2); // added 2 to reserve memory for lower/upper fill base points that might be needed for fill
15391  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2);
15392  // calculate steps from lineData and transform to pixel coordinates:
15393  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15394  {
15395  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15396  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15397  double key;
15398  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastValue);
15399  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastKey);
15400  for (int i=1; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15401  {
15402  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key)+lastKey)*0.5;
15403  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setX(lastValue);
15404  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setY(key);
15405  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15406  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15407  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(lastValue);
15408  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15409  }
15410  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setX(lastValue);
15411  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setY(lastKey);
15412  } else // key axis is horizontal
15413  {
15414  double lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().key);
15415  double lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.first().value);
15416  double key;
15417  (*linePixelData)[0].setX(lastKey);
15418  (*linePixelData)[0].setY(lastValue);
15419  for (int i=1; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15420  {
15421  key = (keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key)+lastKey)*0.5;
15422  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setX(key);
15423  (*linePixelData)[i*2-1].setY(lastValue);
15424  lastValue = valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value);
15425  lastKey = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15426  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15427  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(lastValue);
15428  }
15429  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setX(lastKey);
15430  (*linePixelData)[lineData.size()*2-1].setY(lastValue);
15431  }
15432 
15433 }
15434 
15446 void QCPGraph::getImpulsePlotData(QVector<QPointF> *linePixelData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15447 {
15448  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15449  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15450  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15451  if (!linePixelData) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "null pointer passed as linePixelData"; return; }
15452 
15453  QVector<QCPData> lineData;
15454  getPreparedData(&lineData, scatterData);
15455  linePixelData->resize(lineData.size()*2); // no need to reserve 2 extra points because impulse plot has no fill
15456 
15457  // transform lineData points to pixels:
15458  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15459  {
15460  double zeroPointX = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
15461  double key;
15462  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15463  {
15464  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15465  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(zeroPointX);
15466  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(key);
15467  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15468  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(key);
15469  }
15470  } else // key axis is horizontal
15471  {
15472  double zeroPointY = valueAxis->coordToPixel(0);
15473  double key;
15474  for (int i=0; i<lineData.size(); ++i)
15475  {
15476  key = keyAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).key);
15477  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setX(key);
15478  (*linePixelData)[i*2+0].setY(zeroPointY);
15479  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setX(key);
15480  (*linePixelData)[i*2+1].setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(lineData.at(i).value));
15481  }
15482  }
15483 }
15484 
15498 void QCPGraph::drawFill(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15499 {
15500  if (mLineStyle == lsImpulse) return; // fill doesn't make sense for impulse plot
15501  if (mainBrush().style() == Qt::NoBrush || mainBrush().color().alpha() == 0) return;
15502 
15503  applyFillAntialiasingHint(painter);
15504  if (!mChannelFillGraph)
15505  {
15506  // draw base fill under graph, fill goes all the way to the zero-value-line:
15507  addFillBasePoints(lineData);
15508  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15509  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15510  painter->drawPolygon(QPolygonF(*lineData));
15511  removeFillBasePoints(lineData);
15512  } else
15513  {
15514  // draw channel fill between this graph and mChannelFillGraph:
15515  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
15516  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
15517  painter->drawPolygon(getChannelFillPolygon(lineData));
15518  }
15519 }
15520 
15530 void QCPGraph::drawScatterPlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15531 {
15532  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15533  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15534  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15535 
15536  // draw error bars:
15537  if (mErrorType != etNone)
15538  {
15539  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
15540  painter->setPen(mErrorPen);
15541  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15542  {
15543  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15544  drawError(painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), scatterData->at(i));
15545  } else
15546  {
15547  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15548  drawError(painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), scatterData->at(i));
15549  }
15550  }
15551 
15552  // draw scatter point symbols:
15553  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
15554  mScatterStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
15555  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15556  {
15557  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15558  if (!qIsNaN(scatterData->at(i).value))
15559  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value), keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key));
15560  } else
15561  {
15562  for (int i=0; i<scatterData->size(); ++i)
15563  if (!qIsNaN(scatterData->at(i).value))
15564  mScatterStyle.drawShape(painter, keyAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).key), valueAxis->coordToPixel(scatterData->at(i).value));
15565  }
15566 }
15567 
15577 void QCPGraph::drawLinePlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15578 {
15579  // draw line of graph:
15580  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
15581  {
15582  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15583  painter->setPen(mainPen());
15584  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15585 
15586  /* Draws polyline in batches, currently not used:
15587  int p = 0;
15588  while (p < lineData->size())
15589  {
15590  int batch = qMin(25, lineData->size()-p);
15591  if (p != 0)
15592  {
15593  ++batch;
15594  --p; // to draw the connection lines between two batches
15595  }
15596  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+p, batch);
15597  p += batch;
15598  }
15599  */
15600 
15601  // if drawing solid line and not in PDF, use much faster line drawing instead of polyline:
15602  if (mParentPlot->plottingHints().testFlag(QCP::phFastPolylines) &&
15603  painter->pen().style() == Qt::SolidLine &&
15604  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmVectorized)&&
15605  !painter->modes().testFlag(QCPPainter::pmNoCaching))
15606  {
15607  int i = 1;
15608  int lineDataSize = lineData->size();
15609  while (i < lineDataSize)
15610  {
15611  if (!qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).y()) && !qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).x())) // NaNs create a gap in the line
15612  painter->drawLine(lineData->at(i-1), lineData->at(i));
15613  else
15614  ++i;
15615  ++i;
15616  }
15617  } else
15618  {
15619  int segmentStart = 0;
15620  int i = 0;
15621  int lineDataSize = lineData->size();
15622  while (i < lineDataSize)
15623  {
15624  if (qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).y()) || qIsNaN(lineData->at(i).x())) // NaNs create a gap in the line
15625  {
15626  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+segmentStart, i-segmentStart); // i, because we don't want to include the current NaN point
15627  segmentStart = i+1;
15628  }
15629  ++i;
15630  }
15631  // draw last segment:
15632  painter->drawPolyline(lineData->constData()+segmentStart, lineDataSize-segmentStart); // lineDataSize, because we do want to include the last point
15633  }
15634  }
15635 }
15636 
15644 void QCPGraph::drawImpulsePlot(QCPPainter *painter, QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
15645 {
15646  // draw impulses:
15647  if (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0)
15648  {
15649  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
15650  QPen pen = mainPen();
15651  pen.setCapStyle(Qt::FlatCap); // so impulse line doesn't reach beyond zero-line
15652  painter->setPen(pen);
15653  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
15654  painter->drawLines(*lineData);
15655  }
15656 }
15657 
15670 void QCPGraph::getPreparedData(QVector<QCPData> *lineData, QVector<QCPData> *scatterData) const
15671 {
15672  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15673  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15674  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15675  // get visible data range:
15676  QCPDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after the upper point
15677  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
15678  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
15679  return;
15680 
15681  // count points in visible range, taking into account that we only need to count to the limit maxCount if using adaptive sampling:
15682  int maxCount = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
15683  if (mAdaptiveSampling)
15684  {
15685  int keyPixelSpan = qAbs(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())-keyAxis->coordToPixel(upper.key()));
15686  maxCount = 2*keyPixelSpan+2;
15687  }
15688  int dataCount = countDataInBounds(lower, upper, maxCount);
15689 
15690  if (mAdaptiveSampling && dataCount >= maxCount) // use adaptive sampling only if there are at least two points per pixel on average
15691  {
15692  if (lineData)
15693  {
15694  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15695  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
15696  double minValue = it.value().value;
15697  double maxValue = it.value().value;
15698  QCPDataMap::const_iterator currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
15699  int reversedFactor = keyAxis->rangeReversed() != (keyAxis->orientation()==Qt::Vertical) ? -1 : 1; // is used to calculate keyEpsilon pixel into the correct direction
15700  int reversedRound = keyAxis->rangeReversed() != (keyAxis->orientation()==Qt::Vertical) ? 1 : 0; // is used to switch between floor (normal) and ceil (reversed) rounding of currentIntervalStartKey
15701  double currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())+reversedRound));
15702  double lastIntervalEndKey = currentIntervalStartKey;
15703  double keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor)); // interval of one pixel on screen when mapped to plot key coordinates
15704  bool keyEpsilonVariable = keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic; // indicates whether keyEpsilon needs to be updated after every interval (for log axes)
15705  int intervalDataCount = 1;
15706  ++it; // advance iterator to second data point because adaptive sampling works in 1 point retrospect
15707  while (it != upperEnd)
15708  {
15709  if (it.key() < currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon) // data point is still within same pixel, so skip it and expand value span of this cluster if necessary
15710  {
15711  if (it.value().value < minValue)
15712  minValue = it.value().value;
15713  else if (it.value().value > maxValue)
15714  maxValue = it.value().value;
15715  ++intervalDataCount;
15716  } else // new pixel interval started
15717  {
15718  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them to a cluster
15719  {
15720  if (lastIntervalEndKey < currentIntervalStartKey-keyEpsilon) // last point is further away, so first point of this cluster must be at a real data point
15721  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.2, currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15722  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.25, minValue));
15723  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.75, maxValue));
15724  if (it.key() > currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*2) // new pixel started further away from previous cluster, so make sure the last point of the cluster is at a real data point
15725  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.8, (it-1).value().value));
15726  } else
15727  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalFirstPoint.key(), currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15728  lastIntervalEndKey = (it-1).value().key;
15729  minValue = it.value().value;
15730  maxValue = it.value().value;
15731  currentIntervalFirstPoint = it;
15732  currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.key())+reversedRound));
15733  if (keyEpsilonVariable)
15734  keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor));
15735  intervalDataCount = 1;
15736  }
15737  ++it;
15738  }
15739  // handle last interval:
15740  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them to a cluster
15741  {
15742  if (lastIntervalEndKey < currentIntervalStartKey-keyEpsilon) // last point wasn't a cluster, so first point of this cluster must be at a real data point
15743  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.2, currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15744  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.25, minValue));
15745  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon*0.75, maxValue));
15746  } else
15747  lineData->append(QCPData(currentIntervalFirstPoint.key(), currentIntervalFirstPoint.value().value));
15748  }
15749 
15750  if (scatterData)
15751  {
15752  double valueMaxRange = valueAxis->range().upper;
15753  double valueMinRange = valueAxis->range().lower;
15754  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15755  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
15756  double minValue = it.value().value;
15757  double maxValue = it.value().value;
15758  QCPDataMap::const_iterator minValueIt = it;
15759  QCPDataMap::const_iterator maxValueIt = it;
15760  QCPDataMap::const_iterator currentIntervalStart = it;
15761  int reversedFactor = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? -1 : 1; // is used to calculate keyEpsilon pixel into the correct direction
15762  int reversedRound = keyAxis->rangeReversed() ? 1 : 0; // is used to switch between floor (normal) and ceil (reversed) rounding of currentIntervalStartKey
15763  double currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(lower.key())+reversedRound));
15764  double keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor)); // interval of one pixel on screen when mapped to plot key coordinates
15765  bool keyEpsilonVariable = keyAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic; // indicates whether keyEpsilon needs to be updated after every interval (for log axes)
15766  int intervalDataCount = 1;
15767  ++it; // advance iterator to second data point because adaptive sampling works in 1 point retrospect
15768  while (it != upperEnd)
15769  {
15770  if (it.key() < currentIntervalStartKey+keyEpsilon) // data point is still within same pixel, so skip it and expand value span of this pixel if necessary
15771  {
15772  if (it.value().value < minValue && it.value().value > valueMinRange && it.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15773  {
15774  minValue = it.value().value;
15775  minValueIt = it;
15776  } else if (it.value().value > maxValue && it.value().value > valueMinRange && it.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15777  {
15778  maxValue = it.value().value;
15779  maxValueIt = it;
15780  }
15781  ++intervalDataCount;
15782  } else // new pixel started
15783  {
15784  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them
15785  {
15786  // determine value pixel span and add as many points in interval to maintain certain vertical data density (this is specific to scatter plot):
15787  double valuePixelSpan = qAbs(valueAxis->coordToPixel(minValue)-valueAxis->coordToPixel(maxValue));
15788  int dataModulo = qMax(1, qRound(intervalDataCount/(valuePixelSpan/4.0))); // approximately every 4 value pixels one data point on average
15789  QCPDataMap::const_iterator intervalIt = currentIntervalStart;
15790  int c = 0;
15791  while (intervalIt != it)
15792  {
15793  if ((c % dataModulo == 0 || intervalIt == minValueIt || intervalIt == maxValueIt) && intervalIt.value().value > valueMinRange && intervalIt.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15794  scatterData->append(intervalIt.value());
15795  ++c;
15796  ++intervalIt;
15797  }
15798  } else if (currentIntervalStart.value().value > valueMinRange && currentIntervalStart.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15799  scatterData->append(currentIntervalStart.value());
15800  minValue = it.value().value;
15801  maxValue = it.value().value;
15802  currentIntervalStart = it;
15803  currentIntervalStartKey = keyAxis->pixelToCoord((int)(keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.key())+reversedRound));
15804  if (keyEpsilonVariable)
15805  keyEpsilon = qAbs(currentIntervalStartKey-keyAxis->pixelToCoord(keyAxis->coordToPixel(currentIntervalStartKey)+1.0*reversedFactor));
15806  intervalDataCount = 1;
15807  }
15808  ++it;
15809  }
15810  // handle last interval:
15811  if (intervalDataCount >= 2) // last pixel had multiple data points, consolidate them
15812  {
15813  // determine value pixel span and add as many points in interval to maintain certain vertical data density (this is specific to scatter plot):
15814  double valuePixelSpan = qAbs(valueAxis->coordToPixel(minValue)-valueAxis->coordToPixel(maxValue));
15815  int dataModulo = qMax(1, qRound(intervalDataCount/(valuePixelSpan/4.0))); // approximately every 4 value pixels one data point on average
15816  QCPDataMap::const_iterator intervalIt = currentIntervalStart;
15817  int c = 0;
15818  while (intervalIt != it)
15819  {
15820  if ((c % dataModulo == 0 || intervalIt == minValueIt || intervalIt == maxValueIt) && intervalIt.value().value > valueMinRange && intervalIt.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15821  scatterData->append(intervalIt.value());
15822  ++c;
15823  ++intervalIt;
15824  }
15825  } else if (currentIntervalStart.value().value > valueMinRange && currentIntervalStart.value().value < valueMaxRange)
15826  scatterData->append(currentIntervalStart.value());
15827  }
15828  } else // don't use adaptive sampling algorithm, transfer points one-to-one from the map into the output parameters
15829  {
15830  QVector<QCPData> *dataVector = 0;
15831  if (lineData)
15832  dataVector = lineData;
15833  else if (scatterData)
15834  dataVector = scatterData;
15835  if (dataVector)
15836  {
15837  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
15838  QCPDataMap::const_iterator upperEnd = upper+1;
15839  dataVector->reserve(dataCount+2); // +2 for possible fill end points
15840  while (it != upperEnd)
15841  {
15842  dataVector->append(it.value());
15843  ++it;
15844  }
15845  }
15846  if (lineData && scatterData)
15847  *scatterData = *dataVector;
15848  }
15849 }
15850 
15858 void QCPGraph::drawError(QCPPainter *painter, double x, double y, const QCPData &data) const
15859 {
15860  if (qIsNaN(data.value))
15861  return;
15862  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
15863  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
15864  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
15865 
15866  double a, b; // positions of error bar bounds in pixels
15867  double barWidthHalf = mErrorBarSize*0.5;
15868  double skipSymbolMargin = mScatterStyle.size(); // pixels left blank per side, when mErrorBarSkipSymbol is true
15869 
15870  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
15871  {
15872  // draw key error vertically and value error horizontally
15873  if (mErrorType == etKey || mErrorType == etBoth)
15874  {
15875  a = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key-data.keyErrorMinus);
15876  b = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key+data.keyErrorPlus);
15877  if (keyAxis->rangeReversed())
15878  qSwap(a,b);
15879  // draw spine:
15880  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15881  {
15882  if (a-y > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15883  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, y+skipSymbolMargin));
15884  if (y-b > skipSymbolMargin)
15885  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-skipSymbolMargin, x, b));
15886  } else
15887  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, b));
15888  // draw handles:
15889  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, a, x+barWidthHalf, a));
15890  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, b, x+barWidthHalf, b));
15891  }
15892  if (mErrorType == etValue || mErrorType == etBoth)
15893  {
15894  a = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value-data.valueErrorMinus);
15895  b = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value+data.valueErrorPlus);
15896  if (valueAxis->rangeReversed())
15897  qSwap(a,b);
15898  // draw spine:
15899  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15900  {
15901  if (x-a > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15902  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, x-skipSymbolMargin, y));
15903  if (b-x > skipSymbolMargin)
15904  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+skipSymbolMargin, y, b, y));
15905  } else
15906  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, b, y));
15907  // draw handles:
15908  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y-barWidthHalf, a, y+barWidthHalf));
15909  painter->drawLine(QLineF(b, y-barWidthHalf, b, y+barWidthHalf));
15910  }
15911  } else // mKeyAxis->orientation() is Qt::Horizontal
15912  {
15913  // draw value error vertically and key error horizontally
15914  if (mErrorType == etKey || mErrorType == etBoth)
15915  {
15916  a = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key-data.keyErrorMinus);
15917  b = keyAxis->coordToPixel(data.key+data.keyErrorPlus);
15918  if (keyAxis->rangeReversed())
15919  qSwap(a,b);
15920  // draw spine:
15921  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15922  {
15923  if (x-a > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15924  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, x-skipSymbolMargin, y));
15925  if (b-x > skipSymbolMargin)
15926  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x+skipSymbolMargin, y, b, y));
15927  } else
15928  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y, b, y));
15929  // draw handles:
15930  painter->drawLine(QLineF(a, y-barWidthHalf, a, y+barWidthHalf));
15931  painter->drawLine(QLineF(b, y-barWidthHalf, b, y+barWidthHalf));
15932  }
15933  if (mErrorType == etValue || mErrorType == etBoth)
15934  {
15935  a = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value-data.valueErrorMinus);
15936  b = valueAxis->coordToPixel(data.value+data.valueErrorPlus);
15937  if (valueAxis->rangeReversed())
15938  qSwap(a,b);
15939  // draw spine:
15940  if (mErrorBarSkipSymbol)
15941  {
15942  if (a-y > skipSymbolMargin) // don't draw spine if error is so small it's within skipSymbolmargin
15943  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, y+skipSymbolMargin));
15944  if (y-b > skipSymbolMargin)
15945  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, y-skipSymbolMargin, x, b));
15946  } else
15947  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x, a, x, b));
15948  // draw handles:
15949  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, a, x+barWidthHalf, a));
15950  painter->drawLine(QLineF(x-barWidthHalf, b, x+barWidthHalf, b));
15951  }
15952  }
15953 }
15954 
15969 void QCPGraph::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPDataMap::const_iterator &lower, QCPDataMap::const_iterator &upper) const
15970 {
15971  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
15972  if (mData->isEmpty())
15973  {
15974  lower = mData->constEnd();
15975  upper = mData->constEnd();
15976  return;
15977  }
15978 
15979  // get visible data range as QMap iterators
15980  QCPDataMap::const_iterator lbound = mData->lowerBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
15981  QCPDataMap::const_iterator ubound = mData->upperBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
15982  bool lowoutlier = lbound != mData->constBegin(); // indicates whether there exist points below axis range
15983  bool highoutlier = ubound != mData->constEnd(); // indicates whether there exist points above axis range
15984 
15985  lower = (lowoutlier ? lbound-1 : lbound); // data point range that will be actually drawn
15986  upper = (highoutlier ? ubound : ubound-1); // data point range that will be actually drawn
15987 }
15988 
15999 int QCPGraph::countDataInBounds(const QCPDataMap::const_iterator &lower, const QCPDataMap::const_iterator &upper, int maxCount) const
16000 {
16001  if (upper == mData->constEnd() && lower == mData->constEnd())
16002  return 0;
16003  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = lower;
16004  int count = 1;
16005  while (it != upper && count < maxCount)
16006  {
16007  ++it;
16008  ++count;
16009  }
16010  return count;
16011 }
16012 
16028 void QCPGraph::addFillBasePoints(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
16029 {
16030  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
16031 
16032  // append points that close the polygon fill at the key axis:
16033  if (mKeyAxis.data()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16034  {
16035  *lineData << upperFillBasePoint(lineData->last().y());
16036  *lineData << lowerFillBasePoint(lineData->first().y());
16037  } else
16038  {
16039  *lineData << upperFillBasePoint(lineData->last().x());
16040  *lineData << lowerFillBasePoint(lineData->first().x());
16041  }
16042 }
16043 
16050 void QCPGraph::removeFillBasePoints(QVector<QPointF> *lineData) const
16051 {
16052  lineData->remove(lineData->size()-2, 2);
16053 }
16054 
16069 QPointF QCPGraph::lowerFillBasePoint(double lowerKey) const
16070 {
16071  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16072  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16073  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
16074 
16075  QPointF point;
16076  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
16077  {
16078  if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atLeft)
16079  {
16080  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16081  point.setY(lowerKey);
16082  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atRight)
16083  {
16084  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16085  point.setY(lowerKey);
16086  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop)
16087  {
16088  point.setX(lowerKey);
16089  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16090  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16091  {
16092  point.setX(lowerKey);
16093  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16094  }
16095  } else // valueAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic
16096  {
16097  // In logarithmic scaling we can't just draw to value zero so we just fill all the way
16098  // to the axis which is in the direction towards zero
16099  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical)
16100  {
16101  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16102  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16103  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->right());
16104  else
16105  point.setX(keyAxis->axisRect()->left());
16106  point.setY(lowerKey);
16107  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop || keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16108  {
16109  point.setX(lowerKey);
16110  if ((valueAxis->range().upper < 0 && !valueAxis->rangeReversed()) ||
16111  (valueAxis->range().upper > 0 && valueAxis->rangeReversed())) // if range is negative, zero is on opposite side of key axis
16112  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->top());
16113  else
16114  point.setY(keyAxis->axisRect()->bottom());
16115  }
16116  }
16117  return point;
16118 }
16119 
16134 QPointF QCPGraph::upperFillBasePoint(double upperKey) const
16135 {
16136  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
16137  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
16138  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return QPointF(); }
16139 
16140  QPointF point;
16141  if (valueAxis->scaleType() == QCPAxis::stLinear)
16142  {
16143  if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atLeft)
16144  {
16145  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16146  point.setY(upperKey);
16147  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atRight)
16148  {
16149  point.setX(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16150  point.setY(upperKey);
16151  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atTop)
16152  {
16153  point.setX(upperKey);
16154  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16155  } else if (keyAxis->axisType() == QCPAxis::atBottom)
16156  {
16157  point.setX(upperKey);
16158  point.setY(valueAxis->coordToPixel(0));
16159  }
16160  } else // valueAxis->mScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic
16161  {
16162  // In logarithmic scaling we can't just draw to value 0 so we just fill all the way
16163  // to the axis which is in the direction towards 0
