18971  {
18972  double max = 0; // don't use mBaseValue here because only base value of bottom-most bar has meaning in a bar stack
18973  // find bars of mBarBelow that are approximately at key and find largest one:
18974  double epsilon = qAbs(key)*1e-6; // should be safe even when changed to use float at some point
18975  if (key == 0)
18976  epsilon = 1e-6;
18977  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mBarBelow.data()->mData->lowerBound(key-epsilon);
18978  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator itEnd = mBarBelow.data()->mData->upperBound(key+epsilon);
18979  while (it != itEnd)
18980  {
18981  if ((positive && it.value().value > max) ||
18982  (!positive && it.value().value < max))
18983  max = it.value().value;
18984  ++it;
18985  }
18986  // recurse down the bar-stack to find the total height:
18987  return max + mBarBelow.data()->getStackedBaseValue(key, positive);
18988  } else
18989  return mBaseValue;
18990 }
18991 
19000 void QCPBars::connectBars(QCPBars *lower, QCPBars *upper)
19001 {
19002  if (!lower && !upper) return;
19003 
19004  if (!lower) // disconnect upper at bottom
19005  {
19006  // disconnect old bar below upper:
19007  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
19008  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove = 0;
19009  upper->mBarBelow = 0;
19010  } else if (!upper) // disconnect lower at top
19011  {
19012  // disconnect old bar above lower:
19013  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
19014  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow = 0;
19015  lower->mBarAbove = 0;
19016  } else // connect lower and upper
19017  {
19018  // disconnect old bar above lower:
19019  if (lower->mBarAbove && lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow.data() == lower)
19020  lower->mBarAbove.data()->mBarBelow = 0;
19021  // disconnect old bar below upper:
19022  if (upper->mBarBelow && upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove.data() == upper)
19023  upper->mBarBelow.data()->mBarAbove = 0;
19024  lower->mBarAbove = upper;
19025  upper->mBarBelow = lower;
19026  }
19027 }
19028 
19029 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19030 QCPRange QCPBars::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19031 {
19032  QCPRange range;
19033  bool haveLower = false;
19034  bool haveUpper = false;
19035 
19036  double current;
19037  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
19038  while (it != mData->constEnd())
19039  {
19040  current = it.value().key;
19041  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
19042  {
19043  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
19044  {
19045  range.lower = current;
19046  haveLower = true;
19047  }
19048  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
19049  {
19050  range.upper = current;
19051  haveUpper = true;
19052  }
19053  }
19054  ++it;
19055  }
19056  // determine exact range of bars by including bar width and barsgroup offset:
19057  if (haveLower && mKeyAxis)
19058  {
19059  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth, keyPixel;
19060  getPixelWidth(range.lower, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
19061  keyPixel = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(range.lower) + lowerPixelWidth;
19062  if (mBarsGroup)
19063  keyPixel += mBarsGroup->keyPixelOffset(this, range.lower);
19064  range.lower = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(keyPixel);
19065  }
19066  if (haveUpper && mKeyAxis)
19067  {
19068  double lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth, keyPixel;
19069  getPixelWidth(range.upper, lowerPixelWidth, upperPixelWidth);
19070  keyPixel = mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(range.upper) + upperPixelWidth;
19071  if (mBarsGroup)
19072  keyPixel += mBarsGroup->keyPixelOffset(this, range.upper);
19073  range.upper = mKeyAxis.data()->pixelToCoord(keyPixel);
19074  }
19075  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
19076  return range;
19077 }
19078 
19079 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19080 QCPRange QCPBars::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19081 {
19082  QCPRange range;
19083  range.lower = mBaseValue;
19084  range.upper = mBaseValue;
19085  bool haveLower = true; // set to true, because baseValue should always be visible in bar charts
19086  bool haveUpper = true; // set to true, because baseValue should always be visible in bar charts
19087  double current;
19088 
19089  QCPBarDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
19090  while (it != mData->constEnd())
19091  {
19092  current = it.value().value + getStackedBaseValue(it.value().key, it.value().value >= 0);
19093  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
19094  {
19095  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
19096  {
19097  range.lower = current;
19098  haveLower = true;
19099  }
19100  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
19101  {
19102  range.upper = current;
19103  haveUpper = true;
19104  }
19105  }
19106  ++it;
19107  }
19108 
19109  foundRange = true; // return true because bar charts always have the 0-line visible
19110  return range;
19111 }
19112 
19113 
19117 
19180 QCPStatisticalBox::QCPStatisticalBox(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
19181  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
19182  mKey(0),
19183  mMinimum(0),
19184  mLowerQuartile(0),
19185  mMedian(0),
19186  mUpperQuartile(0),
19187  mMaximum(0)
19188 {
19189  setOutlierStyle(QCPScatterStyle(QCPScatterStyle::ssCircle, Qt::blue, 6));
19190  setWhiskerWidth(0.2);
19191  setWidth(0.5);
19192 
19193  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19194  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2.5));
19195  setMedianPen(QPen(Qt::black, 3, Qt::SolidLine, Qt::FlatCap));
19196  setWhiskerPen(QPen(Qt::black, 0, Qt::DashLine, Qt::FlatCap));
19197  setWhiskerBarPen(QPen(Qt::black));
19198  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
19199  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
19200 }

19266 }

19278 }

19357 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19358 void QCPStatisticalBox::clearData()
19359 {
19360  setOutliers(QVector<double>());
19361  setKey(0);
19362  setMinimum(0);
19363  setLowerQuartile(0);
19364  setMedian(0);
19365  setUpperQuartile(0);
19366  setMaximum(0);
19367 }
19368 
19369 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19370 double QCPStatisticalBox::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
19371 {
19372  Q_UNUSED(details)
19373  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
19374  return -1;
19375  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
19376 
19377  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
19378  {
19379  double posKey, posValue;
19380  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
19381  // quartile box:
19382  QCPRange keyRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19383  QCPRange valueRange(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile);
19384  if (keyRange.contains(posKey) && valueRange.contains(posValue))
19385  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
19386 
19387  // min/max whiskers:
19388  if (QCPRange(mMinimum, mMaximum).contains(posValue))
19389  return qAbs(mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(mKey)-mKeyAxis.data()->coordToPixel(posKey));
19390  }
19391  return -1;
19392 }
19393 
19394 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19395 void QCPStatisticalBox::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
19396 {
19397  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
19398 
19399  // check data validity if flag set:
19400 #ifdef QCUSTOMPLOT_CHECK_DATA
19401  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mKey, mMedian) ||
19402  QCP::isInvalidData(mLowerQuartile, mUpperQuartile) ||
19403  QCP::isInvalidData(mMinimum, mMaximum))
19404  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point at" << mKey << "of drawn range has invalid data." << "Plottable name:" << name();
19405  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
19406  if (QCP::isInvalidData(mOutliers.at(i)))
19407  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Data point outlier at" << mKey << "of drawn range invalid." << "Plottable name:" << name();
19408 #endif
19409 
19410  QRectF quartileBox;
19411  drawQuartileBox(painter, &quartileBox);
19412 
19413  painter->save();
19414  painter->setClipRect(quartileBox, Qt::IntersectClip);
19415  drawMedian(painter);
19416  painter->restore();
19417 
19418  drawWhiskers(painter);
19419  drawOutliers(painter);
19420 }
19421 
19422 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19423 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
19424 {
19425  // draw filled rect:
19426  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19427  painter->setPen(mPen);
19428  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
19429  QRectF r = QRectF(0, 0, rect.width()*0.67, rect.height()*0.67);
19430  r.moveCenter(rect.center());
19431  painter->drawRect(r);
19432 }
19433 
19440 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawQuartileBox(QCPPainter *painter, QRectF *quartileBox) const
19441 {
19442  QRectF box;
19443  box.setTopLeft(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mUpperQuartile));
19444  box.setBottomRight(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mLowerQuartile));
19445  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19446  painter->setPen(mainPen());
19447  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
19448  painter->drawRect(box);
19449  if (quartileBox)
19450  *quartileBox = box;
19451 }
19452 
19457 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawMedian(QCPPainter *painter) const
19458 {
19459  QLineF medianLine;
19460  medianLine.setP1(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
19461  medianLine.setP2(coordsToPixels(mKey+mWidth*0.5, mMedian));
19462  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
19463  painter->setPen(mMedianPen);
19464  painter->drawLine(medianLine);
19465 }
19466 
19471 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawWhiskers(QCPPainter *painter) const
19472 {
19473  QLineF backboneMin, backboneMax, barMin, barMax;
19474  backboneMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mUpperQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMaximum));
19475  backboneMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey, mLowerQuartile), coordsToPixels(mKey, mMinimum));
19476  barMax.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMaximum));
19477  barMin.setPoints(coordsToPixels(mKey-mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum), coordsToPixels(mKey+mWhiskerWidth*0.5, mMinimum));
19478  applyErrorBarsAntialiasingHint(painter);
19479  painter->setPen(mWhiskerPen);
19480  painter->drawLine(backboneMin);
19481  painter->drawLine(backboneMax);
19482  painter->setPen(mWhiskerBarPen);
19483  painter->drawLine(barMin);
19484  painter->drawLine(barMax);
19485 }
19486 
19491 void QCPStatisticalBox::drawOutliers(QCPPainter *painter) const
19492 {
19493  applyScattersAntialiasingHint(painter);
19494  mOutlierStyle.applyTo(painter, mPen);
19495  for (int i=0; i<mOutliers.size(); ++i)
19496  mOutlierStyle.drawShape(painter, coordsToPixels(mKey, mOutliers.at(i)));
19497 }
19498 
19499 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19500 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19501 {
19502  foundRange = true;
19503  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth)
19504  {
19505  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19506  } else if (inSignDomain == sdNegative)
19507  {
19508  if (mKey+mWidth*0.5 < 0)
19509  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19510  else if (mKey < 0)
19511  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey);
19512  else
19513  {
19514  foundRange = false;
19515  return QCPRange();
19516  }
19517  } else if (inSignDomain == sdPositive)
19518  {
19519  if (mKey-mWidth*0.5 > 0)
19520  return QCPRange(mKey-mWidth*0.5, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19521  else if (mKey > 0)
19522  return QCPRange(mKey, mKey+mWidth*0.5);
19523  else
19524  {
19525  foundRange = false;
19526  return QCPRange();
19527  }
19528  }
19529  foundRange = false;
19530  return QCPRange();
19531 }
19532 
19533 /* inherits documentation from base class */
19534 QCPRange QCPStatisticalBox::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
19535 {
19536  QVector<double> values; // values that must be considered (i.e. all outliers and the five box-parameters)
19537  values.reserve(mOutliers.size() + 5);
19538  values << mMaximum << mUpperQuartile << mMedian << mLowerQuartile << mMinimum;
19539  values << mOutliers;
19540  // go through values and find the ones in legal range:
19541  bool haveUpper = false;
19542  bool haveLower = false;
19543  double upper = 0;
19544  double lower = 0;
19545  for (int i=0; i<values.size(); ++i)
19546  {
19547  if ((inSignDomain == sdNegative && values.at(i) < 0) ||
19548  (inSignDomain == sdPositive && values.at(i) > 0) ||
19549  (inSignDomain == sdBoth))
19550  {
19551  if (values.at(i) > upper || !haveUpper)
19552  {
19553  upper = values.at(i);
19554  haveUpper = true;
19555  }
19556  if (values.at(i) < lower || !haveLower)
19557  {
19558  lower = values.at(i);
19559  haveLower = true;
19560  }
19561  }
19562  }
19563  // return the bounds if we found some sensible values:
19564  if (haveLower && haveUpper)
19565  {
19566  foundRange = true;
19567  return QCPRange(lower, upper);
19568  } else // might happen if all values are in other sign domain
19569  {
19570  foundRange = false;
19571  return QCPRange();
19572  }
19573 }
19574 
19575 
19579 
19608 /* start of documentation of inline functions */
19609 
19616 /* end of documentation of inline functions */
19617 
19625 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(int keySize, int valueSize, const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange) :
19626  mKeySize(0),
19627  mValueSize(0),
19628  mKeyRange(keyRange),
19629  mValueRange(valueRange),
19630  mIsEmpty(true),
19631  mData(0),
19632  mDataModified(true)
19633 {
19634  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
19635  fill(0);
19636 }
19637 
19638 QCPColorMapData::~QCPColorMapData()
19639 {
19640  if (mData)
19641  delete[] mData;
19642 }
19643 
19647 QCPColorMapData::QCPColorMapData(const QCPColorMapData &other) :
19648  mKeySize(0),
19649  mValueSize(0),
19650  mIsEmpty(true),
19651  mData(0),
19652  mDataModified(true)
19653 {
19654  *this = other;
19655 }
19656 
19660 QCPColorMapData &QCPColorMapData::operator=(const QCPColorMapData &other)
19661 {
19662  if (&other != this)
19663  {
19664  const int keySize = other.keySize();
19665  const int valueSize = other.valueSize();
19666  setSize(keySize, valueSize);
19667  setRange(other.keyRange(), other.valueRange());
19668  if (!mIsEmpty)
19669  memcpy(mData, other.mData, sizeof(mData[0])*keySize*valueSize);
19670  mDataBounds = other.mDataBounds;
19671  mDataModified = true;
19672  }
19673  return *this;
19674 }
19675 
19676 /* undocumented getter */
19677 double QCPColorMapData::data(double key, double value)
19678 {
19679  int keyCell = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
19680  int valueCell = (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
19681  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
19682  return mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell];
19683  else
19684  return 0;
19685 }
19686 
19687 /* undocumented getter */
19688 double QCPColorMapData::cell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex)
19689 {
19690  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
19691  return mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex];
19692  else
19693  return 0;
19694 }
19695 
19708 void QCPColorMapData::setSize(int keySize, int valueSize)
19709 {
19710  if (keySize != mKeySize || valueSize != mValueSize)
19711  {
19712  mKeySize = keySize;
19713  mValueSize = valueSize;
19714  if (mData)
19715  delete[] mData;
19716  mIsEmpty = mKeySize == 0 || mValueSize == 0;
19717  if (!mIsEmpty)
19718  {
19719 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
19720  try { // 2D arrays get memory intensive fast. So if the allocation fails, at least output debug message
19721 #endif
19722  mData = new double[mKeySize*mValueSize];
19723 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
19724  } catch (...) { mData = 0; }
19725 #endif
19726  if (mData)
19727  fill(0);
19728  else
19729  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "out of memory for data dimensions "<< mKeySize << "*" << mValueSize;
19730  } else
19731  mData = 0;
19732  mDataModified = true;
19733  }
19734 }
19735 
19746 void QCPColorMapData::setKeySize(int keySize)
19747 {
19748  setSize(keySize, mValueSize);
19749 }
19750 
19761 void QCPColorMapData::setValueSize(int valueSize)
19762 {
19763  setSize(mKeySize, valueSize);
19764 }
19765 
19776 void QCPColorMapData::setRange(const QCPRange &keyRange, const QCPRange &valueRange)
19777 {
19778  setKeyRange(keyRange);
19779  setValueRange(valueRange);
19780 }
19781 
19792 void QCPColorMapData::setKeyRange(const QCPRange &keyRange)
19793 {
19794  mKeyRange = keyRange;
19795 }
19796 
19807 void QCPColorMapData::setValueRange(const QCPRange &valueRange)
19808 {
19809  mValueRange = valueRange;
19810 }
19811 
19818 void QCPColorMapData::setData(double key, double value, double z)
19819 {
19820  int keyCell = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
19821  int valueCell = (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
19822  if (keyCell >= 0 && keyCell < mKeySize && valueCell >= 0 && valueCell < mValueSize)
19823  {
19824  mData[valueCell*mKeySize + keyCell] = z;
19825  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
19826  mDataBounds.lower = z;
19827  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
19828  mDataBounds.upper = z;
19829  mDataModified = true;
19830  }
19831 }
19832 
19844 void QCPColorMapData::setCell(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double z)
19845 {
19846  if (keyIndex >= 0 && keyIndex < mKeySize && valueIndex >= 0 && valueIndex < mValueSize)
19847  {
19848  mData[valueIndex*mKeySize + keyIndex] = z;
19849  if (z < mDataBounds.lower)
19850  mDataBounds.lower = z;
19851  if (z > mDataBounds.upper)
19852  mDataBounds.upper = z;
19853  mDataModified = true;
19854  }
19855 }
19856 
19870 void QCPColorMapData::recalculateDataBounds()
19871 {
19872  if (mKeySize > 0 && mValueSize > 0)
19873  {
19874  double minHeight = mData[0];
19875  double maxHeight = mData[0];
19876  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
19877  for (int i=0; i<dataCount; ++i)
19878  {
19879  if (mData[i] > maxHeight)
19880  maxHeight = mData[i];
19881  if (mData[i] < minHeight)
19882  minHeight = mData[i];
19883  }
19884  mDataBounds.lower = minHeight;
19885  mDataBounds.upper = maxHeight;
19886  }
19887 }
19888 
19894 void QCPColorMapData::clear()
19895 {
19896  setSize(0, 0);
19897 }
19898 
19902 void QCPColorMapData::fill(double z)
19903 {
19904  const int dataCount = mValueSize*mKeySize;
19905  for (int i=0; i<dataCount; ++i)
19906  mData[i] = z;
19907  mDataBounds = QCPRange(z, z);
19908 }
19909 
19922 void QCPColorMapData::coordToCell(double key, double value, int *keyIndex, int *valueIndex) const
19923 {
19924  if (keyIndex)
19925  *keyIndex = (key-mKeyRange.lower)/(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)*(mKeySize-1)+0.5;
19926  if (valueIndex)
19927  *valueIndex = (value-mValueRange.lower)/(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)*(mValueSize-1)+0.5;
19928 }
19929 
19940 void QCPColorMapData::cellToCoord(int keyIndex, int valueIndex, double *key, double *value) const
19941 {
19942  if (key)
19943  *key = keyIndex/(double)(mKeySize-1)*(mKeyRange.upper-mKeyRange.lower)+mKeyRange.lower;
19944  if (value)
19945  *value = valueIndex/(double)(mValueSize-1)*(mValueRange.upper-mValueRange.lower)+mValueRange.lower;
19946 }
19947 
19948 
19952

20026 
20035 /* end documentation of inline functions */
20036 
20037 /* start documentation of signals */
20038 
20060 /* end documentation of signals */
20061 
20068 QCPColorMap::QCPColorMap(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
20069  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
20070  mDataScaleType(QCPAxis::stLinear),
20071  mMapData(new QCPColorMapData(10, 10, QCPRange(0, 5), QCPRange(0, 5))),
20072  mInterpolate(true),
20073  mTightBoundary(false),
20074  mMapImageInvalidated(true)
20075 {
20076 }
20077 
20078 QCPColorMap::~QCPColorMap()
20079 {
20080  delete mMapData;
20081 }
20082 
20090 void QCPColorMap::setData(QCPColorMapData *data, bool copy)
20091 {
20092  if (mMapData == data)
20093  {
20094  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
20095  return;
20096  }
20097  if (copy)
20098  {
20099  *mMapData = *data;
20100  } else
20101  {
20102  delete mMapData;
20103  mMapData = data;
20104  }
20105  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20106 }
20107 
20116 void QCPColorMap::setDataRange(const QCPRange &dataRange)
20117 {
20118  if (!QCPRange::validRange(dataRange)) return;
20119  if (mDataRange.lower != dataRange.lower || mDataRange.upper != dataRange.upper)
20120  {
20121  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
20122  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLogScale();
20123  else
20124  mDataRange = dataRange.sanitizedForLinScale();
20125  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20126  emit dataRangeChanged(mDataRange);
20127  }
20128 }
20129 
20135 void QCPColorMap::setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType scaleType)
20136 {
20137  if (mDataScaleType != scaleType)
20138  {
20139  mDataScaleType = scaleType;
20140  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20141  emit dataScaleTypeChanged(mDataScaleType);
20142  if (mDataScaleType == QCPAxis::stLogarithmic)
20143  setDataRange(mDataRange.sanitizedForLogScale());
20144  }
20145 }
20146 
20158 void QCPColorMap::setGradient(const QCPColorGradient &gradient)
20159 {
20160  if (mGradient != gradient)
20161  {
20162  mGradient = gradient;
20163  mMapImageInvalidated = true;
20164  emit gradientChanged(mGradient);
20165  }
20166 }
20167 
20174 void QCPColorMap::setInterpolate(bool enabled)
20175 {
20176  mInterpolate = enabled;
20177 }
20178 
20190 void QCPColorMap::setTightBoundary(bool enabled)
20191 {
20192  mTightBoundary = enabled;
20193 }
20194 
20209 void QCPColorMap::setColorScale(QCPColorScale *colorScale)
20210 {
20211  if (mColorScale) // unconnect signals from old color scale
20212  {
20213  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20214  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20215  disconnect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20216  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20217  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20218  disconnect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20219  }
20220  mColorScale = colorScale;
20221  if (mColorScale) // connect signals to new color scale
20222  {
20223  setGradient(mColorScale.data()->gradient());
20224  setDataRange(mColorScale.data()->dataRange());
20225  setDataScaleType(mColorScale.data()->dataScaleType());
20226  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20227  connect(this, SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20228  connect(this, SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), mColorScale.data(), SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20229  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataRangeChanged(QCPRange)), this, SLOT(setDataRange(QCPRange)));
20230  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(gradientChanged(QCPColorGradient)), this, SLOT(setGradient(QCPColorGradient)));
20231  connect(mColorScale.data(), SIGNAL(dataScaleTypeChanged(QCPAxis::ScaleType)), this, SLOT(setDataScaleType(QCPAxis::ScaleType)));
20232  }
20233 }
20234 
20255 void QCPColorMap::rescaleDataRange(bool recalculateDataBounds)
20256 {
20257  if (recalculateDataBounds)
20258  mMapData->recalculateDataBounds();
20259  setDataRange(mMapData->dataBounds());
20260 }
20261 
20276 void QCPColorMap::updateLegendIcon(Qt::TransformationMode transformMode, const QSize &thumbSize)
20277 {
20278  if (mMapImage.isNull() && !data()->isEmpty())
20279  updateMapImage(); // try to update map image if it's null (happens if no draw has happened yet)
20280 
20281  if (!mMapImage.isNull()) // might still be null, e.g. if data is empty, so check here again
20282  {
20283  bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
20284  bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
20285  mLegendIcon = QPixmap::fromImage(mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY)).scaled(thumbSize, Qt::KeepAspectRatio, transformMode);
20286  }
20287 }
20288 
20293 void QCPColorMap::clearData()
20294 {
20295  mMapData->clear();
20296 }
20297 
20298 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20299 double QCPColorMap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
20300 {
20301  Q_UNUSED(details)
20302  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20303  return -1;
20304  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
20305 
20306  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
20307  {
20308  double posKey, posValue;
20309  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
20310  if (mMapData->keyRange().contains(posKey) && mMapData->valueRange().contains(posValue))
20311  return mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
20312  }
20313  return -1;
20314 }
20315 
20325 void QCPColorMap::updateMapImage()
20326 {
20327  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
20328  if (!keyAxis) return;
20329 
20330  // resize mMapImage to correct dimensions, according to key/value axes orientation:
20331  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal && (mMapImage.size().width() != mMapData->keySize() || mMapImage.size().height() != mMapData->valueSize()))
20332  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(mMapData->keySize(), mMapData->valueSize()), QImage::Format_RGB32);
20333  else if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical && (mMapImage.size().width() != mMapData->valueSize() || mMapImage.size().height() != mMapData->keySize()))
20334  mMapImage = QImage(QSize(mMapData->valueSize(), mMapData->keySize()), QImage::Format_RGB32);
20335 
20336  const int keySize = mMapData->keySize();
20337  const int valueSize = mMapData->valueSize();
20338  const double *rawData = mMapData->mData;
20339 
20340  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
20341  {
20342  const int lineCount = valueSize;
20343  const int rowCount = keySize;
20344  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
20345  {
20346  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mMapImage.scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
20347  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line*rowCount, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, 1, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
20348  }
20349  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
20350  {
20351  const int lineCount = keySize;
20352  const int rowCount = valueSize;
20353  for (int line=0; line<lineCount; ++line)
20354  {
20355  QRgb* pixels = reinterpret_cast<QRgb*>(mMapImage.scanLine(lineCount-1-line)); // invert scanline index because QImage counts scanlines from top, but our vertical index counts from bottom (mathematical coordinate system)
20356  mGradient.colorize(rawData+line, mDataRange, pixels, rowCount, lineCount, mDataScaleType==QCPAxis::stLogarithmic);
20357  }
20358  }
20359 
20360  mMapData->mDataModified = false;
20361  mMapImageInvalidated = false;
20362 }
20363 
20364 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20365 void QCPColorMap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
20366 {
20367  if (mMapData->isEmpty()) return;
20368  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) return;
20369  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
20370 
20371  if (mMapData->mDataModified || mMapImageInvalidated)
20372  updateMapImage();
20373 
20374  double halfSampleKey = 0;
20375  double halfSampleValue = 0;
20376  if (mMapData->keySize() > 1)
20377  halfSampleKey = 0.5*mMapData->keyRange().size()/(double)(mMapData->keySize()-1);
20378  if (mMapData->valueSize() > 1)
20379  halfSampleValue = 0.5*mMapData->valueRange().size()/(double)(mMapData->valueSize()-1);
20380  QRectF imageRect(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower-halfSampleKey, mMapData->valueRange().lower-halfSampleValue),
20381  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper+halfSampleKey, mMapData->valueRange().upper+halfSampleValue));
20382  imageRect = imageRect.normalized();
20383  bool mirrorX = (keyAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal ? keyAxis() : valueAxis())->rangeReversed();
20384  bool mirrorY = (valueAxis()->orientation() == Qt::Vertical ? valueAxis() : keyAxis())->rangeReversed();
20385  bool smoothBackup = painter->renderHints().testFlag(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform);
20386  painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, mInterpolate);
20387  QRegion clipBackup;
20388  if (mTightBoundary)
20389  {
20390  clipBackup = painter->clipRegion();
20391  painter->setClipRect(QRectF(coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().lower, mMapData->valueRange().lower),
20392  coordsToPixels(mMapData->keyRange().upper, mMapData->valueRange().upper)).normalized(), Qt::IntersectClip);
20393  }
20394  painter->drawImage(imageRect, mMapImage.mirrored(mirrorX, mirrorY));
20395  if (mTightBoundary)
20396  painter->setClipRegion(clipBackup);
20397  painter->setRenderHint(QPainter::SmoothPixmapTransform, smoothBackup);
20398 }
20399 
20400 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20401 void QCPColorMap::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
20402 {
20403  applyDefaultAntialiasingHint(painter);
20404  // draw map thumbnail:
20405  if (!mLegendIcon.isNull())
20406  {
20407  QPixmap scaledIcon = mLegendIcon.scaled(rect.size().toSize(), Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::FastTransformation);
20408  QRectF iconRect = QRectF(0, 0, scaledIcon.width(), scaledIcon.height());
20409  iconRect.moveCenter(rect.center());
20410  painter->drawPixmap(iconRect.topLeft(), scaledIcon);
20411  }
20412  /*
20413  // draw frame:
20414  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
20415  painter->setPen(Qt::black);
20416  painter->drawRect(rect.adjusted(1, 1, 0, 0));
20417  */
20418 }
20419 
20420 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20421 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
20422 {
20423  foundRange = true;
20424  QCPRange result = mMapData->keyRange();
20425  result.normalize();
20426  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive)
20427  {
20428  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
20429  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
20430  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
20431  foundRange = false;
20432  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative)
20433  {
20434  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
20435  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
20436  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
20437  foundRange = false;
20438  }
20439  return result;
20440 }
20441 
20442 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20443 QCPRange QCPColorMap::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, SignDomain inSignDomain) const
20444 {
20445  foundRange = true;
20446  QCPRange result = mMapData->valueRange();
20447  result.normalize();
20448  if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdPositive)
20449  {
20450  if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper > 0)
20451  result.lower = result.upper*1e-3;
20452  else if (result.lower <= 0 && result.upper <= 0)
20453  foundRange = false;
20454  } else if (inSignDomain == QCPAbstractPlottable::sdNegative)
20455  {
20456  if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower < 0)
20457  result.upper = result.lower*1e-3;
20458  else if (result.upper >= 0 && result.lower >= 0)
20459  foundRange = false;
20460  }
20461  return result;
20462 }

20491  low(0),
20492  close(0)
20493 {
20494 }

20500  key(key),
20501  open(open),
20502  high(high),
20503  low(low),
20504  close(close)
20505 {
20506 }

20565 QCPFinancial::QCPFinancial(QCPAxis *keyAxis, QCPAxis *valueAxis) :
20566  QCPAbstractPlottable(keyAxis, valueAxis),
20567  mData(0),
20568  mChartStyle(csOhlc),
20569  mWidth(0.5),
20570  mTwoColored(false),
20571  mBrushPositive(QBrush(QColor(210, 210, 255))),
20572  mBrushNegative(QBrush(QColor(255, 210, 210))),
20573  mPenPositive(QPen(QColor(10, 40, 180))),
20574  mPenNegative(QPen(QColor(180, 40, 10)))
20575 {
20576  mData = new QCPFinancialDataMap;
20577 
20578  setSelectedPen(QPen(QColor(80, 80, 255), 2.5));
20579  setSelectedBrush(QBrush(QColor(80, 80, 255)));
20580 }

20583 {

20585 }
20586 
20599 void QCPFinancial::setData(QCPFinancialDataMap *data, bool copy)
20600 {
20601  if (mData == data)
20602  {
20603  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "The data pointer is already in (and owned by) this plottable" << reinterpret_cast<quintptr>(data);
20604  return;
20605  }
20606  if (copy)
20607  {
20608  *mData = *data;
20609  } else
20610  {
20611  delete mData;
20612  mData = data;
20613  }
20614 }
20615 
20623 void QCPFinancial::setData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &open, const QVector<double> &high, const QVector<double> &low, const QVector<double> &close)
20624 {
20625  mData->clear();
20626  int n = key.size();
20627  n = qMin(n, open.size());
20628  n = qMin(n, high.size());
20629  n = qMin(n, low.size());
20630  n = qMin(n, close.size());
20631  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
20632  {
20633  mData->insertMulti(key[i], QCPFinancialData(key[i], open[i], high[i], low[i], close[i]));
20634  }
20635 }

20641 {
20642  mChartStyle = style;
20643 }

20652  mWidth = width;
20653 }

20665 {
20666  mTwoColored = twoColored;
20667 }

20679 {
20680  mBrushPositive = brush;

20762 void QCPFinancial::addData(double key, double open, double high, double low, double close)

20766 
20776 void QCPFinancial::addData(const QVector<double> &key, const QVector<double> &open, const QVector<double> &high, const QVector<double> &low, const QVector<double> &close)
20777 {
20778  int n = key.size();
20779  n = qMin(n, open.size());
20780  n = qMin(n, high.size());
20781  n = qMin(n, low.size());
20782  n = qMin(n, close.size());
20783  for (int i=0; i<n; ++i)
20784  {
20785  mData->insertMulti(key[i], QCPFinancialData(key[i], open[i], high[i], low[i], close[i]));
20786  }
20787 }
20788 
20794 void QCPFinancial::removeDataBefore(double key)
20795 {
20796  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->begin();
20797  while (it != mData->end() && it.key() < key)
20798  it = mData->erase(it);
20799 }
20800 
20806 void QCPFinancial::removeDataAfter(double key)
20807 {
20808  if (mData->isEmpty()) return;
20809  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(key);
20810  while (it != mData->end())
20811  it = mData->erase(it);
20812 }
20813 
20821 void QCPFinancial::removeData(double fromKey, double toKey)
20822 {
20823  if (fromKey >= toKey || mData->isEmpty()) return;
20824  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator it = mData->upperBound(fromKey);
20825  QCPFinancialDataMap::iterator itEnd = mData->upperBound(toKey);
20826  while (it != itEnd)
20827  it = mData->erase(it);
20828 }
20829 
20838 void QCPFinancial::removeData(double key)
20839 {
20840  mData->remove(key);
20841 }
20842 
20848 void QCPFinancial::clearData()
20849 {
20850  mData->clear();
20851 }
20852 
20853 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20854 double QCPFinancial::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
20855 {
20856  Q_UNUSED(details)
20857  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
20858  return -1;
20859  if (!mKeyAxis || !mValueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
20860 
20861  if (mKeyAxis.data()->axisRect()->rect().contains(pos.toPoint()))
20862  {
20863  // get visible data range:
20864  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after the upper point
20865  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
20866  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
20867  return -1;
20868  // perform select test according to configured style:
20869  switch (mChartStyle)
20870  {
20871  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
20872  return ohlcSelectTest(pos, lower, upper+1); break;
20873  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
20874  return candlestickSelectTest(pos, lower, upper+1); break;
20875  }
20876  }
20877  return -1;
20878 }
20879 
20893 QCPFinancialDataMap QCPFinancial::timeSeriesToOhlc(const QVector<double> &time, const QVector<double> &value, double timeBinSize, double timeBinOffset)
20894 {
20895  QCPFinancialDataMap map;
20896  int count = qMin(time.size(), value.size());
20897  if (count == 0)
20898  return QCPFinancialDataMap();
20899 
20900  QCPFinancialData currentBinData(0, value.first(), value.first(), value.first(), value.first());
20901  int currentBinIndex = qFloor((time.first()-timeBinOffset)/timeBinSize+0.5);
20902  for (int i=0; i<count; ++i)
20903  {
20904  int index = qFloor((time.at(i)-timeBinOffset)/timeBinSize+0.5);
20905  if (currentBinIndex == index) // data point still in current bin, extend high/low:
20906  {
20907  if (value.at(i) < currentBinData.low) currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
20908  if (value.at(i) > currentBinData.high) currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
20909  if (i == count-1) // last data point is in current bin, finalize bin:
20910  {
20911  currentBinData.close = value.at(i);
20912  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset+(index)*timeBinSize;
20913  map.insert(currentBinData.key, currentBinData);
20914  }
20915  } else // data point not anymore in current bin, set close of old and open of new bin, and add old to map:
20916  {
20917  // finalize current bin:
20918  currentBinData.close = value.at(i-1);
20919  currentBinData.key = timeBinOffset+(index-1)*timeBinSize;
20920  map.insert(currentBinData.key, currentBinData);
20921  // start next bin:
20922  currentBinIndex = index;
20923  currentBinData.open = value.at(i);
20924  currentBinData.high = value.at(i);
20925  currentBinData.low = value.at(i);
20926  }
20927  }
20928 
20929  return map;
20930 }
20931 
20932 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20933 void QCPFinancial::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
20934 {
20935  // get visible data range:
20936  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lower, upper; // note that upper is the actual upper point, and not 1 step after the upper point
20937  getVisibleDataBounds(lower, upper);
20938  if (lower == mData->constEnd() || upper == mData->constEnd())
20939  return;
20940 
20941  // draw visible data range according to configured style:
20942  switch (mChartStyle)
20943  {
20944  case QCPFinancial::csOhlc:
20945  drawOhlcPlot(painter, lower, upper+1); break;
20946  case QCPFinancial::csCandlestick:
20947  drawCandlestickPlot(painter, lower, upper+1); break;
20948  }
20949 }
20950 
20951 /* inherits documentation from base class */
20952 void QCPFinancial::drawLegendIcon(QCPPainter *painter, const QRectF &rect) const
20953 {
20954  painter->setAntialiasing(false); // legend icon especially of csCandlestick looks better without antialiasing
20955  if (mChartStyle == csOhlc)
20956  {
20957  if (mTwoColored)
20958  {
20959  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
20960  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
20961  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
20962  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
20963  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20964  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20965  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20966  // draw bottom right hald icon with negative color:
20967  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
20968  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
20969  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
20970  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20971  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20972  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20973  } else
20974  {
20975  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
20976  painter->setPen(mPen);
20977  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20978  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.3, rect.width()*0.2, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20979  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.8, rect.height()*0.7).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20980  }
20981  } else if (mChartStyle == csCandlestick)
20982  {
20983  if (mTwoColored)
20984  {
20985  // draw upper left half icon with positive color:
20986  painter->setBrush(mBrushPositive);
20987  painter->setPen(mPenPositive);
20988  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.topLeft().toPoint()));
20989  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20990  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20991  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20992  // draw bottom right hald icon with negative color:
20993  painter->setBrush(mBrushNegative);
20994  painter->setPen(mPenNegative);
20995  painter->setClipRegion(QRegion(QPolygon() << rect.bottomLeft().toPoint() << rect.topRight().toPoint() << rect.bottomRight().toPoint()));
20996  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20997  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20998  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
20999  } else
21000  {
21001  painter->setBrush(mBrush);
21002  painter->setPen(mPen);
21003  painter->drawLine(QLineF(0, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21004  painter->drawLine(QLineF(rect.width()*0.75, rect.height()*0.5, rect.width(), rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21005  painter->drawRect(QRectF(rect.width()*0.25, rect.height()*0.25, rect.width()*0.5, rect.height()*0.5).translated(rect.topLeft()));
21006  }
21007  }
21008 }
21009 
21010 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21011 QCPRange QCPFinancial::getKeyRange(bool &foundRange, QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
21012 {
21013  QCPRange range;
21014  bool haveLower = false;
21015  bool haveUpper = false;
21016 
21017  double current;
21018  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
21019  while (it != mData->constEnd())
21020  {
21021  current = it.value().key;
21022  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && current < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && current > 0))
21023  {
21024  if (current < range.lower || !haveLower)
21025  {
21026  range.lower = current;
21027  haveLower = true;
21028  }
21029  if (current > range.upper || !haveUpper)
21030  {
21031  range.upper = current;
21032  haveUpper = true;
21033  }
21034  }
21035  ++it;
21036  }
21037  // determine exact range by including width of bars/flags:
21038  if (haveLower && mKeyAxis)
21039  range.lower = range.lower-mWidth*0.5;
21040  if (haveUpper && mKeyAxis)
21041  range.upper = range.upper+mWidth*0.5;
21042  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
21043  return range;
21044 }
21045 
21046 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21047 QCPRange QCPFinancial::getValueRange(bool &foundRange, QCPAbstractPlottable::SignDomain inSignDomain) const
21048 {
21049  QCPRange range;
21050  bool haveLower = false;
21051  bool haveUpper = false;
21052 
21053  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = mData->constBegin();
21054  while (it != mData->constEnd())
21055  {
21056  // high:
21057  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && it.value().high < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && it.value().high > 0))
21058  {
21059  if (it.value().high < range.lower || !haveLower)
21060  {
21061  range.lower = it.value().high;
21062  haveLower = true;
21063  }
21064  if (it.value().high > range.upper || !haveUpper)
21065  {
21066  range.upper = it.value().high;
21067  haveUpper = true;
21068  }
21069  }
21070  // low:
21071  if (inSignDomain == sdBoth || (inSignDomain == sdNegative && it.value().low < 0) || (inSignDomain == sdPositive && it.value().low > 0))
21072  {
21073  if (it.value().low < range.lower || !haveLower)
21074  {
21075  range.lower = it.value().low;
21076  haveLower = true;
21077  }
21078  if (it.value().low > range.upper || !haveUpper)
21079  {
21080  range.upper = it.value().low;
21081  haveUpper = true;
21082  }
21083  }
21084  ++it;
21085  }
21086 
21087  foundRange = haveLower && haveUpper;
21088  return range;
21089 }
21090 
21097 void QCPFinancial::drawOhlcPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end)
21098 {
21099  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21100  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21101  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
21102 
21103  QPen linePen;
21104 
21105  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21106  {
21107  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21108  {
21109  if (mSelected)
21110  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21111  else if (mTwoColored)
21112  linePen = it.value().close >= it.value().open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative;
21113  else
21114  linePen = mPen;
21115  painter->setPen(linePen);
21116  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21117  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21118  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21119  // draw backbone:
21120  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)));
21121  // draw open:
21122  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5); // sign of this makes sure open/close are on correct sides
21123  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel-keyWidthPixels, openPixel), QPointF(keyPixel, openPixel));
21124  // draw close:
21125  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, closePixel), QPointF(keyPixel+keyWidthPixels, closePixel));
21126  }
21127  } else
21128  {
21129  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21130  {
21131  if (mSelected)
21132  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21133  else if (mTwoColored)
21134  linePen = it.value().close >= it.value().open ? mPenPositive : mPenNegative;
21135  else
21136  linePen = mPen;
21137  painter->setPen(linePen);
21138  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21139  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21140  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21141  // draw backbone:
21142  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel));
21143  // draw open:
21144  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5); // sign of this makes sure open/close are on correct sides
21145  painter->drawLine(QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel-keyWidthPixels), QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel));
21146  // draw close:
21147  painter->drawLine(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel), QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel+keyWidthPixels));
21148  }
21149  }
21150 }
21151 
21158 void QCPFinancial::drawCandlestickPlot(QCPPainter *painter, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end)
21159 {
21160  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21161  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21162  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return; }
21163 
21164  QPen linePen;
21165  QBrush boxBrush;
21166 
21167  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21168  {
21169  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21170  {
21171  if (mSelected)
21172  {
21173  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21174  boxBrush = mSelectedBrush;
21175  } else if (mTwoColored)
21176  {
21177  if (it.value().close >= it.value().open)
21178  {
21179  linePen = mPenPositive;
21180  boxBrush = mBrushPositive;
21181  } else
21182  {
21183  linePen = mPenNegative;
21184  boxBrush = mBrushNegative;
21185  }
21186  } else
21187  {
21188  linePen = mPen;
21189  boxBrush = mBrush;
21190  }
21191  painter->setPen(linePen);
21192  painter->setBrush(boxBrush);
21193  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21194  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21195  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21196  // draw high:
21197  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close))));
21198  // draw low:
21199  painter->drawLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close))));
21200  // draw open-close box:
21201  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5);
21202  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(keyPixel-keyWidthPixels, closePixel), QPointF(keyPixel+keyWidthPixels, openPixel)));
21203  }
21204  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
21205  {
21206  for (QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21207  {
21208  if (mSelected)
21209  {
21210  linePen = mSelectedPen;
21211  boxBrush = mSelectedBrush;
21212  } else if (mTwoColored)
21213  {
21214  if (it.value().close >= it.value().open)
21215  {
21216  linePen = mPenPositive;
21217  boxBrush = mBrushPositive;
21218  } else
21219  {
21220  linePen = mPenNegative;
21221  boxBrush = mBrushNegative;
21222  }
21223  } else
21224  {
21225  linePen = mPen;
21226  boxBrush = mBrush;
21227  }
21228  painter->setPen(linePen);
21229  painter->setBrush(boxBrush);
21230  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21231  double openPixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().open);
21232  double closePixel = valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().close);
21233  // draw high:
21234  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel));
21235  // draw low:
21236  painter->drawLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel));
21237  // draw open-close box:
21238  double keyWidthPixels = keyPixel-keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5);
21239  painter->drawRect(QRectF(QPointF(closePixel, keyPixel-keyWidthPixels), QPointF(openPixel, keyPixel+keyWidthPixels)));
21240  }
21241  }
21242 }
21243 
21249 double QCPFinancial::ohlcSelectTest(const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) const
21250 {
21251  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21252  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21253  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
21254 
21255  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
21256  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it;
21257  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21258  {
21259  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21260  {
21261  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21262  // calculate distance to backbone:
21263  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)), pos);
21264  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21265  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21266  }
21267  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
21268  {
21269  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21270  {
21271  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21272  // calculate distance to backbone:
21273  double currentDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel), pos);
21274  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21275  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21276  }
21277  }
21278  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
21279 }
21280 
21287 double QCPFinancial::candlestickSelectTest(const QPointF &pos, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &begin, const QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &end) const
21288 {
21289  QCPAxis *keyAxis = mKeyAxis.data();
21290  QCPAxis *valueAxis = mValueAxis.data();
21291  if (!keyAxis || !valueAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key or value axis"; return -1; }
21292 
21293  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
21294  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator it;
21295  if (keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Horizontal)
21296  {
21297  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21298  {
21299  double currentDistSqr;
21300  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
21301  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5, it.value().key+mWidth*0.5);
21302  QCPRange boxValueRange(it.value().close, it.value().open);
21303  double posKey, posValue;
21304  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
21305  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) && boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
21306  {
21307  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 * mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
21308  } else
21309  {
21310  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
21311  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21312  double highLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close))), pos);
21313  double lowLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low)), QPointF(keyPixel, valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close))), pos);
21314  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
21315  }
21316  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21317  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21318  }
21319  } else // keyAxis->orientation() == Qt::Vertical
21320  {
21321  for (it = begin; it != end; ++it)
21322  {
21323  double currentDistSqr;
21324  // determine whether pos is in open-close-box:
21325  QCPRange boxKeyRange(it.value().key-mWidth*0.5, it.value().key+mWidth*0.5);
21326  QCPRange boxValueRange(it.value().close, it.value().open);
21327  double posKey, posValue;
21328  pixelsToCoords(pos, posKey, posValue);
21329  if (boxKeyRange.contains(posKey) && boxValueRange.contains(posValue)) // is in open-close-box
21330  {
21331  currentDistSqr = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 * mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
21332  } else
21333  {
21334  // calculate distance to high/low lines:
21335  double keyPixel = keyAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().key);
21336  double highLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().high), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMax(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel), pos);
21337  double lowLineDistSqr = distSqrToLine(QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(it.value().low), keyPixel), QPointF(valueAxis->coordToPixel(qMin(it.value().open, it.value().close)), keyPixel), pos);
21338  currentDistSqr = qMin(highLineDistSqr, lowLineDistSqr);
21339  }
21340  if (currentDistSqr < minDistSqr)
21341  minDistSqr = currentDistSqr;
21342  }
21343  }
21344  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
21345 }
21346 
21363 void QCPFinancial::getVisibleDataBounds(QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &lower, QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator &upper) const
21364 {
21365  if (!mKeyAxis) { qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid key axis"; return; }
21366  if (mData->isEmpty())
21367  {
21368  lower = mData->constEnd();
21369  upper = mData->constEnd();
21370  return;
21371  }
21372 
21373  // get visible data range as QMap iterators
21374  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator lbound = mData->lowerBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().lower);
21375  QCPFinancialDataMap::const_iterator ubound = mData->upperBound(mKeyAxis.data()->range().upper);
21376  bool lowoutlier = lbound != mData->constBegin(); // indicates whether there exist points below axis range
21377  bool highoutlier = ubound != mData->constEnd(); // indicates whether there exist points above axis range
21378 
21379  lower = (lowoutlier ? lbound-1 : lbound); // data point range that will be actually drawn
21380  upper = (highoutlier ? ubound : ubound-1); // data point range that will be actually drawn
21381 }
21382 
21383 
21387 
21401 QCPItemStraightLine::QCPItemStraightLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
21402  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
21403  point1(createPosition(QLatin1String("point1"))),
21404  point2(createPosition(QLatin1String("point2")))
21405 {
21406  point1->setCoords(0, 0);
21407  point2->setCoords(1, 1);
21408 
21409  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21410  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
21411 }
21412 
21413 QCPItemStraightLine::~QCPItemStraightLine()
21414 {
21415 }
21416 
21422 void QCPItemStraightLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
21423 {
21424  mPen = pen;
21425 }
21426 
21432 void QCPItemStraightLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
21433 {
21434  mSelectedPen = pen;
21435 }
21436 
21437 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21438 double QCPItemStraightLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
21439 {
21440  Q_UNUSED(details)
21441  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21442  return -1;
21443 
21444  return distToStraightLine(QVector2D(point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(point2->pixelPoint()-point1->pixelPoint()), QVector2D(pos));
21445 }
21446 
21447 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21448 void QCPItemStraightLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21449 {
21450  QVector2D start(point1->pixelPoint());
21451  QVector2D end(point2->pixelPoint());
21452  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
21453  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
21454  QLineF line = getRectClippedStraightLine(start, end-start, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
21455  // paint visible segment, if existent:
21456  if (!line.isNull())
21457  {
21458  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21459  painter->drawLine(line);
21460  }
21461 }
21462 
21470 double QCPItemStraightLine::distToStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QVector2D &point) const
21471 {
21472  return qAbs((base.y()-point.y())*vec.x()-(base.x()-point.x())*vec.y())/vec.length();
21473 }
21474 
21482 QLineF QCPItemStraightLine::getRectClippedStraightLine(const QVector2D &base, const QVector2D &vec, const QRect &rect) const
21483 {
21484  double bx, by;
21485  double gamma;
21486  QLineF result;
21487  if (vec.x() == 0 && vec.y() == 0)
21488  return result;
21489  if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is vertical
21490  {
21491  // check top of rect:
21492  bx = rect.left();
21493  by = rect.top();
21494  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
21495  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21496  result.setLine(bx+gamma, rect.top(), bx+gamma, rect.bottom()); // no need to check bottom because we know line is vertical
21497  } else if (qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is horizontal
21498  {
21499  // check left of rect:
21500  bx = rect.left();
21501  by = rect.top();
21502  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
21503  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21504  result.setLine(rect.left(), by+gamma, rect.right(), by+gamma); // no need to check right because we know line is horizontal
21505  } else // line is skewed
21506  {
21507  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
21508  // check top of rect:
21509  bx = rect.left();
21510  by = rect.top();
21511  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
21512  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21513  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21514  // check bottom of rect:
21515  bx = rect.left();
21516  by = rect.bottom();
21517  gamma = base.x()-bx + (by-base.y())*vec.x()/vec.y();
21518  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21519  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21520  // check left of rect:
21521  bx = rect.left();
21522  by = rect.top();
21523  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
21524  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21525  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
21526  // check right of rect:
21527  bx = rect.right();
21528  by = rect.top();
21529  gamma = base.y()-by + (bx-base.x())*vec.y()/vec.x();
21530  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21531  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
21532 
21533  // evaluate points:
21534  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
21535  {
21536  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
21537  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
21538  {
21539  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
21540  double distSqrMax = 0;
21541  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
21542  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
21543  {
21544  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
21545  {
21546  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
21547  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
21548  {
21549  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
21550  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
21551  distSqrMax = distSqr;
21552  }
21553  }
21554  }
21555  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
21556  }
21557  }
21558  return result;
21559 }
21560 
21566 QPen QCPItemStraightLine::mainPen() const
21567 {
21568  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
21569 }
21570 
21571 
21575 
21591 QCPItemLine::QCPItemLine(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
21592  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
21593  start(createPosition(QLatin1String("start"))),
21594  end(createPosition(QLatin1String("end")))
21595 {
21596  start->setCoords(0, 0);
21597  end->setCoords(1, 1);
21598 
21599  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21600  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
21601 }
21602 
21603 QCPItemLine::~QCPItemLine()
21604 {
21605 }
21606 
21612 void QCPItemLine::setPen(const QPen &pen)
21613 {
21614  mPen = pen;
21615 }
21616 
21622 void QCPItemLine::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
21623 {
21624  mSelectedPen = pen;
21625 }
21626 
21635 void QCPItemLine::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
21636 {
21637  mHead = head;
21638 }
21639 
21648 void QCPItemLine::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
21649 {
21650  mTail = tail;
21651 }
21652 
21653 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21654 double QCPItemLine::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
21655 {
21656  Q_UNUSED(details)
21657  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21658  return -1;
21659 
21660  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine(start->pixelPoint(), end->pixelPoint(), pos));
21661 }
21662 
21663 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21664 void QCPItemLine::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21665 {
21666  QVector2D startVec(start->pixelPoint());
21667  QVector2D endVec(end->pixelPoint());
21668  if (startVec.toPoint() == endVec.toPoint())
21669  return;
21670  // get visible segment of straight line inside clipRect:
21671  double clipPad = qMax(mHead.boundingDistance(), mTail.boundingDistance());
21672  clipPad = qMax(clipPad, (double)mainPen().widthF());
21673  QLineF line = getRectClippedLine(startVec, endVec, clipRect().adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad));
21674  // paint visible segment, if existent:
21675  if (!line.isNull())
21676  {
21677  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21678  painter->drawLine(line);
21679  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
21680  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
21681  mTail.draw(painter, startVec, startVec-endVec);
21682  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
21683  mHead.draw(painter, endVec, endVec-startVec);
21684  }
21685 }
21686 
21694 QLineF QCPItemLine::getRectClippedLine(const QVector2D &start, const QVector2D &end, const QRect &rect) const
21695 {
21696  bool containsStart = rect.contains(start.x(), start.y());
21697  bool containsEnd = rect.contains(end.x(), end.y());
21698  if (containsStart && containsEnd)
21699  return QLineF(start.toPointF(), end.toPointF());
21700 
21701  QVector2D base = start;
21702  QVector2D vec = end-start;
21703  double bx, by;
21704  double gamma, mu;
21705  QLineF result;
21706  QList<QVector2D> pointVectors;
21707 
21708  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.y())) // line is not horizontal
21709  {
21710  // check top of rect:
21711  bx = rect.left();
21712  by = rect.top();
21713  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
21714  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
21715  {
21716  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
21717  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21718  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21719  }
21720  // check bottom of rect:
21721  bx = rect.left();
21722  by = rect.bottom();
21723  mu = (by-base.y())/vec.y();
21724  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
21725  {
21726  gamma = base.x()-bx + mu*vec.x();
21727  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.width())
21728  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx+gamma, by));
21729  }
21730  }
21731  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(vec.x())) // line is not vertical
21732  {
21733  // check left of rect:
21734  bx = rect.left();
21735  by = rect.top();
21736  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
21737  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
21738  {
21739  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
21740  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21741  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
21742  }
21743  // check right of rect:
21744  bx = rect.right();
21745  by = rect.top();
21746  mu = (bx-base.x())/vec.x();
21747  if (mu >= 0 && mu <= 1)
21748  {
21749  gamma = base.y()-by + mu*vec.y();
21750  if (gamma >= 0 && gamma <= rect.height())
21751  pointVectors.append(QVector2D(bx, by+gamma));
21752  }
21753  }
21754 
21755  if (containsStart)
21756  pointVectors.append(start);
21757  if (containsEnd)
21758  pointVectors.append(end);
21759 
21760  // evaluate points:
21761  if (pointVectors.size() == 2)
21762  {
21763  result.setPoints(pointVectors.at(0).toPointF(), pointVectors.at(1).toPointF());
21764  } else if (pointVectors.size() > 2)
21765  {
21766  // line probably goes through corner of rect, and we got two points there. single out the point pair with greatest distance:
21767  double distSqrMax = 0;
21768  QVector2D pv1, pv2;
21769  for (int i=0; i<pointVectors.size()-1; ++i)
21770  {
21771  for (int k=i+1; k<pointVectors.size(); ++k)
21772  {
21773  double distSqr = (pointVectors.at(i)-pointVectors.at(k)).lengthSquared();
21774  if (distSqr > distSqrMax)
21775  {
21776  pv1 = pointVectors.at(i);
21777  pv2 = pointVectors.at(k);
21778  distSqrMax = distSqr;
21779  }
21780  }
21781  }
21782  result.setPoints(pv1.toPointF(), pv2.toPointF());
21783  }
21784  return result;
21785 }
21786 
21792 QPen QCPItemLine::mainPen() const
21793 {
21794  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
21795 }
21796 
21797 
21801 
21824 QCPItemCurve::QCPItemCurve(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
21825  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
21826  start(createPosition(QLatin1String("start"))),
21827  startDir(createPosition(QLatin1String("startDir"))),
21828  endDir(createPosition(QLatin1String("endDir"))),
21829  end(createPosition(QLatin1String("end")))
21830 {
21831  start->setCoords(0, 0);
21832  startDir->setCoords(0.5, 0);
21833  endDir->setCoords(0, 0.5);
21834  end->setCoords(1, 1);
21835 
21836  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21837  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
21838 }
21839

21841 {
21842 }

21851  mPen = pen;
21852 }

21860 {
21861  mSelectedPen = pen;
21862 }

21872 void QCPItemCurve::setHead(const QCPLineEnding &head)
21873 {
21874  mHead = head;
21875 }

21885 void QCPItemCurve::setTail(const QCPLineEnding &tail)
21886 {
21887  mTail = tail;
21888 }
21889 
21890 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21891 double QCPItemCurve::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
21892 {
21893  Q_UNUSED(details)
21894  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
21895  return -1;
21896 
21897  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
21898  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
21899  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
21900  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
21901 
21902  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
21903  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
21904 
21905  QPolygonF polygon = cubicPath.toSubpathPolygons().first();
21906  double minDistSqr = std::numeric_limits<double>::max();
21907  for (int i=1; i<polygon.size(); ++i)
21908  {
21909  double distSqr = distSqrToLine(polygon.at(i-1), polygon.at(i), pos);
21910  if (distSqr < minDistSqr)
21911  minDistSqr = distSqr;
21912  }
21913  return qSqrt(minDistSqr);
21914 }
21915 
21916 /* inherits documentation from base class */
21917 void QCPItemCurve::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
21918 {
21919  QPointF startVec(start->pixelPoint());
21920  QPointF startDirVec(startDir->pixelPoint());
21921  QPointF endDirVec(endDir->pixelPoint());
21922  QPointF endVec(end->pixelPoint());
21923  if (QVector2D(endVec-startVec).length() > 1e10f) // too large curves cause crash
21924  return;
21925 
21926  QPainterPath cubicPath(startVec);
21927  cubicPath.cubicTo(startDirVec, endDirVec, endVec);
21928 
21929  // paint visible segment, if existent:
21930  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
21931  QRect cubicRect = cubicPath.controlPointRect().toRect();
21932  if (cubicRect.isEmpty()) // may happen when start and end exactly on same x or y position
21933  cubicRect.adjust(0, 0, 1, 1);
21934  if (clip.intersects(cubicRect))
21935  {
21936  painter->setPen(mainPen());
21937  painter->drawPath(cubicPath);
21938  painter->setBrush(Qt::SolidPattern);
21939  if (mTail.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
21940  mTail.draw(painter, QVector2D(startVec), M_PI-cubicPath.angleAtPercent(0)/180.0*M_PI);
21941  if (mHead.style() != QCPLineEnding::esNone)
21942  mHead.draw(painter, QVector2D(endVec), -cubicPath.angleAtPercent(1)/180.0*M_PI);
21943  }
21944 }
21945 
21951 QPen QCPItemCurve::mainPen() const
21952 {
21953  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
21954 }
21955 
21956 
21960 
21974 QCPItemRect::QCPItemRect(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
21975  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
21976  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
21977  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
21978  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
21979  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
21980  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
21981  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
21982  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
21983  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft))
21984 {
21985  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
21986  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
21987 
21988  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
21989  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue,2));
21990  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
21991  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
21992 }
21993

21995 {
21996 }

22004 {
22005  mPen = pen;
22006 }
22007 
22013 void QCPItemRect::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
22014 {
22015  mSelectedPen = pen;
22016 }
22017 
22024 void QCPItemRect::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22025 {
22026  mBrush = brush;
22027 }
22028 
22035 void QCPItemRect::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22036 {
22037  mSelectedBrush = brush;
22038 }
22039 
22040 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22041 double QCPItemRect::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22042 {
22043  Q_UNUSED(details)
22044  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22045  return -1;
22046 
22047  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint()).normalized();
22048  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
22049  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
22050 }
22051 
22052 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22053 void QCPItemRect::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22054 {
22055  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
22056  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
22057  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
22058  return;
22059  QRectF rect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
22060  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
22061  QRectF boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
22062  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect())) // only draw if bounding rect of rect item is visible in cliprect
22063  {
22064  painter->setPen(mainPen());
22065  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
22066  painter->drawRect(rect);
22067  }
22068 }
22069 
22070 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22071 QPointF QCPItemRect::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
22072 {
22073  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
22074  switch (anchorId)
22075  {
22076  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
22077  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
22078  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22079  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22080  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
22081  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
22082  }
22083 
22084  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
22085  return QPointF();
22086 }
22087 
22093 QPen QCPItemRect::mainPen() const
22094 {
22095  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22096 }
22097 
22103 QBrush QCPItemRect::mainBrush() const
22104 {
22105  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
22106 }
22107 
22108 
22112 
22132 QCPItemText::QCPItemText(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22133  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22134  position(createPosition(QLatin1String("position"))),
22135  topLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topLeft"), aiTopLeft)),
22136  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
22137  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
22138  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
22139  bottomRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomRight"), aiBottomRight)),
22140  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
22141  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
22142  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft))
22143 {
22144  position->setCoords(0, 0);
22145 
22146  setRotation(0);
22147  setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignTop|Qt::AlignHCenter);
22148  setPositionAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
22149  setText(QLatin1String("text"));
22150 
22151  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
22152  setSelectedPen(Qt::NoPen);
22153  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22154  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22155  setColor(Qt::black);
22156  setSelectedColor(Qt::blue);
22157 }
