22221 }
22222 
22228 void QCPItemText::setFont(const QFont &font)
22229 {
22230  mFont = font;
22231 }
22232 
22238 void QCPItemText::setSelectedFont(const QFont &font)
22239 {
22240  mSelectedFont = font;
22241 }
22242 
22249 void QCPItemText::setText(const QString &text)
22250 {
22251  mText = text;
22252 }
22253 
22266 void QCPItemText::setPositionAlignment(Qt::Alignment alignment)
22267 {
22268  mPositionAlignment = alignment;
22269 }
22270 
22274 void QCPItemText::setTextAlignment(Qt::Alignment alignment)
22275 {
22276  mTextAlignment = alignment;
22277 }
22278 
22283 void QCPItemText::setRotation(double degrees)
22284 {
22285  mRotation = degrees;
22286 }
22287 
22292 void QCPItemText::setPadding(const QMargins &padding)
22293 {
22294  mPadding = padding;
22295 }
22296 
22297 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22298 double QCPItemText::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22299 {
22300  Q_UNUSED(details)
22301  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22302  return -1;
22303 
22304  // The rect may be rotated, so we transform the actual clicked pos to the rotated
22305  // coordinate system, so we can use the normal rectSelectTest function for non-rotated rects:
22306  QPointF positionPixels(position->pixelPoint());
22307  QTransform inputTransform;
22308  inputTransform.translate(positionPixels.x(), positionPixels.y());
22309  inputTransform.rotate(-mRotation);
22310  inputTransform.translate(-positionPixels.x(), -positionPixels.y());
22311  QPointF rotatedPos = inputTransform.map(pos);
22312  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mFont);
22313  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22314  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
22315  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(positionPixels, textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment);
22316  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
22317 
22318  return rectSelectTest(textBoxRect, rotatedPos, true);
22319 }
22320 
22321 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22322 void QCPItemText::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22323 {
22324  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
22325  QTransform transform = painter->transform();
22326  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
22327  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
22328  transform.rotate(mRotation);
22329  painter->setFont(mainFont());
22330  QRect textRect = painter->fontMetrics().boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22331  QRect textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
22332  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
22333  textRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint()+QPoint(mPadding.left(), mPadding.top()));
22334  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
22335  double clipPad = mainPen().widthF();
22336  QRect boundingRect = textBoxRect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
22337  if (transform.mapRect(boundingRect).intersects(painter->transform().mapRect(clipRect())))
22338  {
22339  painter->setTransform(transform);
22340  if ((mainBrush().style() != Qt::NoBrush && mainBrush().color().alpha() != 0) ||
22341  (mainPen().style() != Qt::NoPen && mainPen().color().alpha() != 0))
22342  {
22343  painter->setPen(mainPen());
22344  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
22345  painter->drawRect(textBoxRect);
22346  }
22347  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22348  painter->setPen(QPen(mainColor()));
22349  painter->drawText(textRect, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22350  }
22351 }
22352 
22353 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22354 QPointF QCPItemText::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
22355 {
22356  // get actual rect points (pretty much copied from draw function):
22357  QPointF pos(position->pixelPoint());
22358  QTransform transform;
22359  transform.translate(pos.x(), pos.y());
22360  if (!qFuzzyIsNull(mRotation))
22361  transform.rotate(mRotation);
22362  QFontMetrics fontMetrics(mainFont());
22363  QRect textRect = fontMetrics.boundingRect(0, 0, 0, 0, Qt::TextDontClip|mTextAlignment, mText);
22364  QRectF textBoxRect = textRect.adjusted(-mPadding.left(), -mPadding.top(), mPadding.right(), mPadding.bottom());
22365  QPointF textPos = getTextDrawPoint(QPointF(0, 0), textBoxRect, mPositionAlignment); // 0, 0 because the transform does the translation
22366  textBoxRect.moveTopLeft(textPos.toPoint());
22367  QPolygonF rectPoly = transform.map(QPolygonF(textBoxRect));
22368 
22369  switch (anchorId)
22370  {
22371  case aiTopLeft: return rectPoly.at(0);
22372  case aiTop: return (rectPoly.at(0)+rectPoly.at(1))*0.5;
22373  case aiTopRight: return rectPoly.at(1);
22374  case aiRight: return (rectPoly.at(1)+rectPoly.at(2))*0.5;
22375  case aiBottomRight: return rectPoly.at(2);
22376  case aiBottom: return (rectPoly.at(2)+rectPoly.at(3))*0.5;
22377  case aiBottomLeft: return rectPoly.at(3);
22378  case aiLeft: return (rectPoly.at(3)+rectPoly.at(0))*0.5;
22379  }
22380 
22381  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
22382  return QPointF();
22383 }
22384 
22395 QPointF QCPItemText::getTextDrawPoint(const QPointF &pos, const QRectF &rect, Qt::Alignment positionAlignment) const
22396 {
22397  if (positionAlignment == 0 || positionAlignment == (Qt::AlignLeft|Qt::AlignTop))
22398  return pos;
22399 
22400  QPointF result = pos; // start at top left
22401  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignHCenter))
22402  result.rx() -= rect.width()/2.0;
22403  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignRight))
22404  result.rx() -= rect.width();
22405  if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignVCenter))
22406  result.ry() -= rect.height()/2.0;
22407  else if (positionAlignment.testFlag(Qt::AlignBottom))
22408  result.ry() -= rect.height();
22409  return result;
22410 }
22411 
22417 QFont QCPItemText::mainFont() const
22418 {
22419  return mSelected ? mSelectedFont : mFont;
22420 }
22421 
22427 QColor QCPItemText::mainColor() const
22428 {
22429  return mSelected ? mSelectedColor : mColor;
22430 }
22431 
22437 QPen QCPItemText::mainPen() const
22438 {
22439  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22440 }
22441 
22447 QBrush QCPItemText::mainBrush() const
22448 {
22449  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
22450 }
22451 
22452 
22456 
22470 QCPItemEllipse::QCPItemEllipse(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22471  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22472  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
22473  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
22474  topLeftRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topLeftRim"), aiTopLeftRim)),
22475  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
22476  topRightRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRightRim"), aiTopRightRim)),
22477  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
22478  bottomRightRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomRightRim"), aiBottomRightRim)),
22479  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
22480  bottomLeftRim(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeftRim"), aiBottomLeftRim)),
22481  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft)),
22482  center(createAnchor(QLatin1String("center"), aiCenter))
22483 {
22484  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
22485  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
22486 
22487  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
22488  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
22489  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22490  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22491 }
22492 
22493 QCPItemEllipse::~QCPItemEllipse()
22494 {
22495 }
22496 
22502 void QCPItemEllipse::setPen(const QPen &pen)
22503 {
22504  mPen = pen;
22505 }
22506 
22512 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
22513 {
22514  mSelectedPen = pen;
22515 }
22516 
22523 void QCPItemEllipse::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22524 {
22525  mBrush = brush;
22526 }
22527 
22534 void QCPItemEllipse::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22535 {
22536  mSelectedBrush = brush;
22537 }
22538 
22539 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22540 double QCPItemEllipse::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22541 {
22542  Q_UNUSED(details)
22543  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22544  return -1;
22545 
22546  double result = -1;
22547  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
22548  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
22549  QPointF center((p1+p2)/2.0);
22550  double a = qAbs(p1.x()-p2.x())/2.0;
22551  double b = qAbs(p1.y()-p2.y())/2.0;
22552  double x = pos.x()-center.x();
22553  double y = pos.y()-center.y();
22554 
22555  // distance to border:
22556  double c = 1.0/qSqrt(x*x/(a*a)+y*y/(b*b));
22557  result = qAbs(c-1)*qSqrt(x*x+y*y);
22558  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
22559  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
22560  {
22561  if (x*x/(a*a) + y*y/(b*b) <= 1)
22562  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
22563  }
22564  return result;
22565 }
22566 
22567 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22568 void QCPItemEllipse::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22569 {
22570  QPointF p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint();
22571  QPointF p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint();
22572  if (p1.toPoint() == p2.toPoint())
22573  return;
22574  QRectF ellipseRect = QRectF(p1, p2).normalized();
22575  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
22576  if (ellipseRect.intersects(clip)) // only draw if bounding rect of ellipse is visible in cliprect
22577  {
22578  painter->setPen(mainPen());
22579  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
22580 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
22581  try // drawEllipse sometimes throws exceptions if ellipse is too big
22582  {
22583 #endif
22584  painter->drawEllipse(ellipseRect);
22585 #ifdef __EXCEPTIONS
22586  } catch (...)
22587  {
22588  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "Item too large for memory, setting invisible";
22589  setVisible(false);
22590  }
22591 #endif
22592  }
22593 }
22594 
22595 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22596 QPointF QCPItemEllipse::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
22597 {
22598  QRectF rect = QRectF(topLeft->pixelPoint(), bottomRight->pixelPoint());
22599  switch (anchorId)
22600  {
22601  case aiTopLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22602  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
22603  case aiTopRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.topRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22604  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22605  case aiBottomRightRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomRight()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22606  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22607  case aiBottomLeftRim: return rect.center()+(rect.bottomLeft()-rect.center())*1/qSqrt(2);
22608  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;
22609  case aiCenter: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22610  }
22611 
22612  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
22613  return QPointF();
22614 }
22615 
22621 QPen QCPItemEllipse::mainPen() const
22622 {
22623  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22624 }
22625 
22631 QBrush QCPItemEllipse::mainBrush() const
22632 {
22633  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
22634 }
22635 
22636 
22640 
22660 QCPItemPixmap::QCPItemPixmap(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22661  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22662  topLeft(createPosition(QLatin1String("topLeft"))),
22663  bottomRight(createPosition(QLatin1String("bottomRight"))),
22664  top(createAnchor(QLatin1String("top"), aiTop)),
22665  topRight(createAnchor(QLatin1String("topRight"), aiTopRight)),
22666  right(createAnchor(QLatin1String("right"), aiRight)),
22667  bottom(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottom"), aiBottom)),
22668  bottomLeft(createAnchor(QLatin1String("bottomLeft"), aiBottomLeft)),
22669  left(createAnchor(QLatin1String("left"), aiLeft))
22670 {
22671  topLeft->setCoords(0, 1);
22672  bottomRight->setCoords(1, 0);
22673 
22674  setPen(Qt::NoPen);
22675  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue));
22676  setScaled(false, Qt::KeepAspectRatio, Qt::SmoothTransformation);
22677 }
22678 
22679 QCPItemPixmap::~QCPItemPixmap()
22680 {
22681 }
22682 
22686 void QCPItemPixmap::setPixmap(const QPixmap &pixmap)
22687 {
22688  mPixmap = pixmap;
22689  if (mPixmap.isNull())
22690  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "pixmap is null";
22691 }
22692 
22697 void QCPItemPixmap::setScaled(bool scaled, Qt::AspectRatioMode aspectRatioMode, Qt::TransformationMode transformationMode)
22698 {
22699  mScaled = scaled;
22700  mAspectRatioMode = aspectRatioMode;
22701  mTransformationMode = transformationMode;
22702  updateScaledPixmap();
22703 }
22704 
22710 void QCPItemPixmap::setPen(const QPen &pen)
22711 {
22712  mPen = pen;
22713 }
22714 
22720 void QCPItemPixmap::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
22721 {
22722  mSelectedPen = pen;
22723 }
22724 
22725 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22726 double QCPItemPixmap::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
22727 {
22728  Q_UNUSED(details)
22729  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
22730  return -1;
22731 
22732  return rectSelectTest(getFinalRect(), pos, true);
22733 }
22734 
22735 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22736 void QCPItemPixmap::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
22737 {
22738  bool flipHorz = false;
22739  bool flipVert = false;
22740  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
22741  double clipPad = mainPen().style() == Qt::NoPen ? 0 : mainPen().widthF();
22742  QRect boundingRect = rect.adjusted(-clipPad, -clipPad, clipPad, clipPad);
22743  if (boundingRect.intersects(clipRect()))
22744  {
22745  updateScaledPixmap(rect, flipHorz, flipVert);
22746  painter->drawPixmap(rect.topLeft(), mScaled ? mScaledPixmap : mPixmap);
22747  QPen pen = mainPen();
22748  if (pen.style() != Qt::NoPen)
22749  {
22750  painter->setPen(pen);
22751  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22752  painter->drawRect(rect);
22753  }
22754  }
22755 }
22756 
22757 /* inherits documentation from base class */
22758 QPointF QCPItemPixmap::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
22759 {
22760  bool flipHorz;
22761  bool flipVert;
22762  QRect rect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
22763  // we actually want denormal rects (negative width/height) here, so restore
22764  // the flipped state:
22765  if (flipHorz)
22766  rect.adjust(rect.width(), 0, -rect.width(), 0);
22767  if (flipVert)
22768  rect.adjust(0, rect.height(), 0, -rect.height());
22769 
22770  switch (anchorId)
22771  {
22772  case aiTop: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.topRight())*0.5;
22773  case aiTopRight: return rect.topRight();
22774  case aiRight: return (rect.topRight()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22775  case aiBottom: return (rect.bottomLeft()+rect.bottomRight())*0.5;
22776  case aiBottomLeft: return rect.bottomLeft();
22777  case aiLeft: return (rect.topLeft()+rect.bottomLeft())*0.5;;
22778  }
22779 
22780  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
22781  return QPointF();
22782 }
22783 
22797 void QCPItemPixmap::updateScaledPixmap(QRect finalRect, bool flipHorz, bool flipVert)
22798 {
22799  if (mPixmap.isNull())
22800  return;
22801 
22802  if (mScaled)
22803  {
22804  if (finalRect.isNull())
22805  finalRect = getFinalRect(&flipHorz, &flipVert);
22806  if (finalRect.size() != mScaledPixmap.size())
22807  {
22808  mScaledPixmap = mPixmap.scaled(finalRect.size(), mAspectRatioMode, mTransformationMode);
22809  if (flipHorz || flipVert)
22810  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap::fromImage(mScaledPixmap.toImage().mirrored(flipHorz, flipVert));
22811  }
22812  } else if (!mScaledPixmap.isNull())
22813  mScaledPixmap = QPixmap();
22814 }
22815 
22830 QRect QCPItemPixmap::getFinalRect(bool *flippedHorz, bool *flippedVert) const
22831 {
22832  QRect result;
22833  bool flipHorz = false;
22834  bool flipVert = false;
22835  QPoint p1 = topLeft->pixelPoint().toPoint();
22836  QPoint p2 = bottomRight->pixelPoint().toPoint();
22837  if (p1 == p2)
22838  return QRect(p1, QSize(0, 0));
22839  if (mScaled)
22840  {
22841  QSize newSize = QSize(p2.x()-p1.x(), p2.y()-p1.y());
22842  QPoint topLeft = p1;
22843  if (newSize.width() < 0)
22844  {
22845  flipHorz = true;
22846  newSize.rwidth() *= -1;
22847  topLeft.setX(p2.x());
22848  }
22849  if (newSize.height() < 0)
22850  {
22851  flipVert = true;
22852  newSize.rheight() *= -1;
22853  topLeft.setY(p2.y());
22854  }
22855  QSize scaledSize = mPixmap.size();
22856  scaledSize.scale(newSize, mAspectRatioMode);
22857  result = QRect(topLeft, scaledSize);
22858  } else
22859  {
22860  result = QRect(p1, mPixmap.size());
22861  }
22862  if (flippedHorz)
22863  *flippedHorz = flipHorz;
22864  if (flippedVert)
22865  *flippedVert = flipVert;
22866  return result;
22867 }
22868 
22874 QPen QCPItemPixmap::mainPen() const
22875 {
22876  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
22877 }
22878 
22879 
22883 
22919 QCPItemTracer::QCPItemTracer(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
22920  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
22921  position(createPosition(QLatin1String("position"))),
22922  mGraph(0)
22923 {
22924  position->setCoords(0, 0);
22925 
22926  setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22927  setSelectedBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
22928  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
22929  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
22930  setStyle(tsCrosshair);
22931  setSize(6);
22932  setInterpolating(false);
22933  setGraphKey(0);
22934 }
22935 
22936 QCPItemTracer::~QCPItemTracer()
22937 {
22938 }
22939 
22945 void QCPItemTracer::setPen(const QPen &pen)
22946 {
22947  mPen = pen;
22948 }
22949 
22955 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
22956 {
22957  mSelectedPen = pen;
22958 }
22959 
22965 void QCPItemTracer::setBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22966 {
22967  mBrush = brush;
22968 }
22969 
22975 void QCPItemTracer::setSelectedBrush(const QBrush &brush)
22976 {
22977  mSelectedBrush = brush;
22978 }
22979 
22984 void QCPItemTracer::setSize(double size)
22985 {
22986  mSize = size;
22987 }
22988 
22995 void QCPItemTracer::setStyle(QCPItemTracer::TracerStyle style)
22996 {
22997  mStyle = style;
22998 }
22999 
23010 void QCPItemTracer::setGraph(QCPGraph *graph)
23011 {
23012  if (graph)
23013  {
23014  if (graph->parentPlot() == mParentPlot)
23015  {
23016  position->setType(QCPItemPosition::ptPlotCoords);
23017  position->setAxes(graph->keyAxis(), graph->valueAxis());
23018  mGraph = graph;
23019  updatePosition();
23020  } else
23021  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph isn't in same QCustomPlot instance as this item";
23022  } else
23023  {
23024  mGraph = 0;
23025  }
23026 }
23027 
23037 void QCPItemTracer::setGraphKey(double key)
23038 {
23039  mGraphKey = key;
23040 }
23041 
23053 void QCPItemTracer::setInterpolating(bool enabled)
23054 {
23055  mInterpolating = enabled;
23056 }
23057 
23058 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23059 double QCPItemTracer::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
23060 {
23061  Q_UNUSED(details)
23062  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
23063  return -1;
23064 
23065  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
23066  double w = mSize/2.0;
23067  QRect clip = clipRect();
23068  switch (mStyle)
23069  {
23070  case tsNone: return -1;
23071  case tsPlus:
23072  {
23073  if (clipRect().intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23074  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0), pos),
23075  distSqrToLine(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w), pos)));
23076  break;
23077  }
23078  case tsCrosshair:
23079  {
23080  return qSqrt(qMin(distSqrToLine(QPointF(clip.left(), center.y()), QPointF(clip.right(), center.y()), pos),
23081  distSqrToLine(QPointF(center.x(), clip.top()), QPointF(center.x(), clip.bottom()), pos)));
23082  }
23083  case tsCircle:
23084  {
23085  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23086  {
23087  // distance to border:
23088  double centerDist = QVector2D(center-pos).length();
23089  double circleLine = w;
23090  double result = qAbs(centerDist-circleLine);
23091  // filled ellipse, allow click inside to count as hit:
23092  if (result > mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99 && mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0)
23093  {
23094  if (centerDist <= circleLine)
23095  result = mParentPlot->selectionTolerance()*0.99;
23096  }
23097  return result;
23098  }
23099  break;
23100  }
23101  case tsSquare:
23102  {
23103  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23104  {
23105  QRectF rect = QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w));
23106  bool filledRect = mBrush.style() != Qt::NoBrush && mBrush.color().alpha() != 0;
23107  return rectSelectTest(rect, pos, filledRect);
23108  }
23109  break;
23110  }
23111  }
23112  return -1;
23113 }
23114 
23115 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23116 void QCPItemTracer::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
23117 {
23118  updatePosition();
23119  if (mStyle == tsNone)
23120  return;
23121 
23122  painter->setPen(mainPen());
23123  painter->setBrush(mainBrush());
23124  QPointF center(position->pixelPoint());
23125  double w = mSize/2.0;
23126  QRect clip = clipRect();
23127  switch (mStyle)
23128  {
23129  case tsNone: return;
23130  case tsPlus:
23131  {
23132  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23133  {
23134  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(-w, 0), center+QPointF(w, 0)));
23135  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center+QPointF(0, -w), center+QPointF(0, w)));
23136  }
23137  break;
23138  }
23139  case tsCrosshair:
23140  {
23141  if (center.y() > clip.top() && center.y() < clip.bottom())
23142  painter->drawLine(QLineF(clip.left(), center.y(), clip.right(), center.y()));
23143  if (center.x() > clip.left() && center.x() < clip.right())
23144  painter->drawLine(QLineF(center.x(), clip.top(), center.x(), clip.bottom()));
23145  break;
23146  }
23147  case tsCircle:
23148  {
23149  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23150  painter->drawEllipse(center, w, w);
23151  break;
23152  }
23153  case tsSquare:
23154  {
23155  if (clip.intersects(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)).toRect()))
23156  painter->drawRect(QRectF(center-QPointF(w, w), center+QPointF(w, w)));
23157  break;
23158  }
23159  }
23160 }
23161 
23174 void QCPItemTracer::updatePosition()
23175 {
23176  if (mGraph)
23177  {
23178  if (mParentPlot->hasPlottable(mGraph))
23179  {
23180  if (mGraph->data()->size() > 1)
23181  {
23182  QCPDataMap::const_iterator first = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
23183  QCPDataMap::const_iterator last = mGraph->data()->constEnd()-1;
23184  if (mGraphKey < first.key())
23185  position->setCoords(first.key(), first.value().value);
23186  else if (mGraphKey > last.key())
23187  position->setCoords(last.key(), last.value().value);
23188  else
23189  {
23190  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->lowerBound(mGraphKey);
23191  if (it != first) // mGraphKey is somewhere between iterators
23192  {
23193  QCPDataMap::const_iterator prevIt = it-1;
23194  if (mInterpolating)
23195  {
23196  // interpolate between iterators around mGraphKey:
23197  double slope = 0;
23198  if (!qFuzzyCompare((double)it.key(), (double)prevIt.key()))
23199  slope = (it.value().value-prevIt.value().value)/(it.key()-prevIt.key());
23200  position->setCoords(mGraphKey, (mGraphKey-prevIt.key())*slope+prevIt.value().value);
23201  } else
23202  {
23203  // find iterator with key closest to mGraphKey:
23204  if (mGraphKey < (prevIt.key()+it.key())*0.5)
23205  it = prevIt;
23206  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
23207  }
23208  } else // mGraphKey is exactly on first iterator
23209  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
23210  }
23211  } else if (mGraph->data()->size() == 1)
23212  {
23213  QCPDataMap::const_iterator it = mGraph->data()->constBegin();
23214  position->setCoords(it.key(), it.value().value);
23215  } else
23216  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph has no data";
23217  } else
23218  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "graph not contained in QCustomPlot instance (anymore)";
23219  }
23220 }
23221 
23227 QPen QCPItemTracer::mainPen() const
23228 {
23229  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
23230 }
23231 
23237 QBrush QCPItemTracer::mainBrush() const
23238 {
23239  return mSelected ? mSelectedBrush : mBrush;
23240 }
23241 
23242 
23246 
23272 QCPItemBracket::QCPItemBracket(QCustomPlot *parentPlot) :
23273  QCPAbstractItem(parentPlot),
23274  left(createPosition(QLatin1String("left"))),
23275  right(createPosition(QLatin1String("right"))),
23276  center(createAnchor(QLatin1String("center"), aiCenter))
23277 {
23278  left->setCoords(0, 0);
23279  right->setCoords(1, 1);
23280 
23281  setPen(QPen(Qt::black));
23282  setSelectedPen(QPen(Qt::blue, 2));
23283  setLength(8);
23284  setStyle(bsCalligraphic);
23285 }
23286 
23287 QCPItemBracket::~QCPItemBracket()
23288 {
23289 }
23290 
23300 void QCPItemBracket::setPen(const QPen &pen)
23301 {
23302  mPen = pen;
23303 }
23304 
23310 void QCPItemBracket::setSelectedPen(const QPen &pen)
23311 {
23312  mSelectedPen = pen;
23313 }
23314 
23323 void QCPItemBracket::setLength(double length)
23324 {
23325  mLength = length;
23326 }
23327 
23333 void QCPItemBracket::setStyle(QCPItemBracket::BracketStyle style)
23334 {
23335  mStyle = style;
23336 }
23337 
23338 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23339 double QCPItemBracket::selectTest(const QPointF &pos, bool onlySelectable, QVariant *details) const
23340 {
23341  Q_UNUSED(details)
23342  if (onlySelectable && !mSelectable)
23343  return -1;
23344 
23345  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
23346  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
23347  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
23348  return -1;
23349 
23350  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
23351  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
23352  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
23353  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
23354 
23355  return qSqrt(distSqrToLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), pos));
23356 }
23357 
23358 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23359 void QCPItemBracket::draw(QCPPainter *painter)
23360 {
23361  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
23362  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
23363  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
23364  return;
23365 
23366  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
23367  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
23368  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
23369  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
23370 
23371  QPolygon boundingPoly;
23372  boundingPoly << leftVec.toPoint() << rightVec.toPoint()
23373  << (rightVec-lengthVec).toPoint() << (leftVec-lengthVec).toPoint();
23374  QRect clip = clipRect().adjusted(-mainPen().widthF(), -mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF(), mainPen().widthF());
23375  if (clip.intersects(boundingPoly.boundingRect()))
23376  {
23377  painter->setPen(mainPen());
23378  switch (mStyle)
23379  {
23380  case bsSquare:
23381  {
23382  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF());
23383  painter->drawLine((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23384  painter->drawLine((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23385  break;
23386  }
23387  case bsRound:
23388  {
23389  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
23390  QPainterPath path;
23391  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23392  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
23393  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23394  painter->drawPath(path);
23395  break;
23396  }
23397  case bsCurly:
23398  {
23399  painter->setBrush(Qt::NoBrush);
23400  QPainterPath path;
23401  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23402  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4f*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
23403  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4f*widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23404  painter->drawPath(path);
23405  break;
23406  }
23407  case bsCalligraphic:
23408  {
23409  painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
23410  painter->setBrush(QBrush(mainPen().color()));
23411  QPainterPath path;
23412  path.moveTo((centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23413 
23414  path.cubicTo((centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec+0.4f*widthVec+0.8f*lengthVec).toPointF(), centerVec.toPointF());
23415  path.cubicTo((centerVec-0.4f*widthVec+0.8f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.8f).toPointF(), (centerVec-widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23416 
23417  path.cubicTo((centerVec-widthVec-lengthVec*0.5f).toPointF(), (centerVec-0.2f*widthVec+1.2f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+lengthVec*0.2f).toPointF());
23418  path.cubicTo((centerVec+0.2f*widthVec+1.2f*lengthVec).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec-lengthVec*0.5f).toPointF(), (centerVec+widthVec+lengthVec).toPointF());
23419 
23420  painter->drawPath(path);
23421  break;
23422  }
23423  }
23424  }
23425 }
23426 
23427 /* inherits documentation from base class */
23428 QPointF QCPItemBracket::anchorPixelPoint(int anchorId) const
23429 {
23430  QVector2D leftVec(left->pixelPoint());
23431  QVector2D rightVec(right->pixelPoint());
23432  if (leftVec.toPoint() == rightVec.toPoint())
23433  return leftVec.toPointF();
23434 
23435  QVector2D widthVec = (rightVec-leftVec)*0.5f;
23436  QVector2D lengthVec(-widthVec.y(), widthVec.x());
23437  lengthVec = lengthVec.normalized()*mLength;
23438  QVector2D centerVec = (rightVec+leftVec)*0.5f-lengthVec;
23439 
23440  switch (anchorId)
23441  {
23442  case aiCenter:
23443  return centerVec.toPointF();
23444  }
23445  qDebug() << Q_FUNC_INFO << "invalid anchorId" << anchorId;
23446  return QPointF();
23447 }
23448 
23454 QPen QCPItemBracket::mainPen() const
23455 {
23456  return mSelected ? mSelectedPen : mPen;
23457 }
